company_industry: Mechanical Or Industrial Engineering, Technology, Information and Internet, and Information Services
description:
Are you a passionate aspiring
 **Full Stack Developer** 
 with expertise in
 **Next.js** 
 , eager to revolutionize the world of online education? Do you thrive in fast-paced, innovative environments where your contributions directly shape the future of learning? If so, we have an exciting internship opportunity for you!
   

  

**About Coursfy**
 Coursfy is a cutting-edge e-learning platform designed to empower instructors and learners with flexibility, creativity, and autonomy. Our mission is to create a seamless, intuitive educational experience through advanced technology, prioritizing simplicity and ease of use.
   

  

 Why Join Coursfy?
   

  

* Innovative Technology: Work on a platform that harnesses the power of Next.js to redefine online education.
* Impactful Work: Your Next.js expertise will enhance the experience for millions of global users.
* User-Centric Design: Collaborate to ensure our platform’s interface remains intuitive and accessible.
* Dynamic Team: Join a passionate group of professionals dedicated to transforming learning.
* Professional Growth: Gain hands-on experience in modern web development and grow your career in a supportive, tech-driven environment.


**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain robust, scalable web applications using Next.js as the core framework.
* Implement dynamic, server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) to optimize performance.
* Collaborate with designers and product managers to craft seamless, responsive user interfaces.
* Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code, leveraging the full potential of Next.js features.
* Optimize for SEO and performance, ensuring fast and accessible user experiences.
* Troubleshoot and debug issues, contributing to the continuous improvement of the platform.
* Stay updated with the latest developments in Next.js and the web development ecosystem.


**Requirements**
* Strong proficiency in Next.js and related technologies (React.js, Redux, JavaScript, TypeScript, etc.).
* Familiarity with server-side rendering, static site generation, and API routes in Next.js.
* Experience with front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, MUI, TailwindCSS, etc.).
* Knowledge of back-end development (Node.js, RESTful APIs, and microservices architecture).
* Understanding of databases (SQL, NoSQL) and version control systems like Git.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team and independently on tasks.


 If you’re ready to bring your
 **Next.js** 
 skills to the forefront of online education, apply today! Let’s shape the future of learning together.

title: Developer - Frontend
description:
Lysa’s vision is to set a new standard in savings through automation, efficiency and an unwavering dedication to our customers' best interests. We believe that many institutions work against their customers and we see a significant opportunity to establish a new financial champion. We are on a mission to make it simpler for people to save smarter. To achieve this, we need to continuously develop our product and expand into new markets. We have an outstanding team, but to further accelerate growth, we need more talented colleagues. We are currently seeking a Developer - Frontend to join our team.
   

  

**The opportunity**
 From concept to deployment, you'll have a direct hand in creating features for our customers and colleagues. Collaborating closely with product managers, designers, legal experts, and customer service, you'll see your ideas come to life and make a real difference.
   

  

 You thrive on turning ideas into user fiendly features and have a solid foundation in software development
   

  

 Technologies that we like at Lysa:
   

  

* React
* React Native
* Typescript


 As a colleague, we believe you share Lysa’s values: Earn trust, Add value, Have grit. You enjoy working in a cross-functional environment and strive to build efficient collaborations across the organisation.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 Lysa offers a unique opportunity to work at the forefront of the financial industry by creating a better way to save and invest.
   

  

 At Lysa, we cherish:
   

  

* A supportive Team environment: Where team members, from any background, are valued, heard, and empowered to take responsibility within a collaborative setting.
* Continuous growth and learning: Opportunities to grow and develop on the job, through mentorship and structured training initiatives.
* Work-Life harmony: We understand the importance of balancing professional achievements with personal well-being.


 Lysa is one of Sweden’s fastest growing FinTech companies - and the largest provider of digital discretionary portfolio management in the Nordics. Today Lysa has 185 000 paying customers and we manage about EUR 5bn. We have launched our platform in Denmark and Finland, and also in Germany. Our team of 75 has a mission-driven culture, a high employee Net Promoter Score (eNPS), and we work hard to have a significant impact on the European savings market. You will have the opportunity to participate in Lysa's long-term incentive program and thereby take part in Lysa's long-term growth.
   

  

 We are a highly skilled and motivated team where earning trust and adding value is at the core of our collaborative culture.
   

  

 Want to join us?
   

  

 Apply now by clicking the link below. For any questions, feel free to reach out to Jakob, VP of Engineering, jakob.rundberg@lysa.se.
   

  

 We're excited to welcome you to our team of brilliant stars.

title: Full-Stack Developer Internship
description:
Do you want to be involved in continuously building a SaaS solution? Are you eager to work closely with the
 **co-founder & CTO** 
 of an innovative startup that’s transforming the e-commerce returns landscape? If you’re passionate about delivering value to customers and shaping a B2B product, this is the internship for you!
   

  

**What you’ll do:**
* You will be involved in everything from new feature development, bug solving and releasing new versions to our production environment.
* You will also interact with our UI/UX team and frontend developers.
* You will be able to understand everything which goes into building our SaaS solution.
* You will also be involved in requirement gathering and interact with our customers when it comes to enhancements and bug-fixing.


**Who you are:**
* Internship should be part of your coursework.
* Fluent in English communication skills (other European languages are a plus)
* Web programming knowledge - preferably Python and React.js
* Understanding of how websites work end-to-end
* Sql skills


**Bonus skills:**
* Knowledge of HTML / CSS / Javascript


**Internship details:**
* Location: Stockholm, with one to two days per week available for home office
* Duration: 5 to 6 months, with start date as soon as possible
* Compensation: This is an unpaid internship, ideal for students or recent graduates looking for real-world experience


 Are you ready to launch your career in product development?
 **Apply now and become part of the yayloh journey!**

title: Full-stack Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
 Development across both backend (using C# .NET 8) and frontend (using React), enabling end-to-end feature delivery and UI/UX improvements.
   

  

**Technologies:** 
 Docker/Kubernetes for containerized deployment and scalability.
   

  

 Azure DevOps (ADO) Pipelines for CI/CD automation and release management.
   

  

**Experience Requirement:** 
 Minimum of 5 years of professional experience in software development, ideally with a proven track record in full-stack projects and modern DevOps practices.
   

  

**Application deadline:** 
 23-09-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Full stack Developer
description:
**🚀 At VIPAS AB we are looking for Full stack Developers in Sweden🚀**
**Are you ready to thrive in the dynamic world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB is on the lookout for passionate, driven professionals to join our growing team and take on exciting new projects across Sweden.**
 🌟 About VIPAS AB
   

  

 At VIPAS AB, we believe technology should empower businesses—not complicate them. We’re an IT consulting company that delivers smart, scalable, and tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java, Python, and Cloud platforms. Our expertise spans: Software Development, DevOps & Automation, Embedded Systems, Manufacturing Enginering, Mechanical Enginering, Android & Mobile Solutions, Project Management & Engineering and so on.
   

  

 We’re not just consultants—we’re strategic partners guiding organizations through digital transformation with confidence and clarity.
   

  

 💼 Your Role
   

  

* Lead or contribute to full stack projects across diverse tech stacks including Java, Python, .NET, React, Node.js, Angular, Vue, and cloud-native platforms.
* Build, deploy, and optimize robust pipelines integrating CI/CD, automation, cloud deployments, and infrastructure as code.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams—including product, UX, and DevOps—to deliver seamless user experiences and scalable systems.
* Mentor developers, champion code quality, and continuously innovate engineering practices.
* Optimize applications and pipelines for performance, security, and reliability.


**Requirements:**
* Full stack developers passionate about end-to-end development and pipeline automation.
* Experience ranging from 2+ years to senior expertise in full stack technologies and cloud infrastructure.
* Familiarity with DevOps tools, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), and cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Strong problem-solving abilities, clean coding mindset, and eagerness to learn new technologies.
* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science or related fields preferred.


 🌟 Why VIPAS AB?
   

  

 At VIPAS AB, we don’t just offer jobs—we build careers. Here’s why top IT professionals choose us:
   

  

* 📄 Secure & Transparent Employment We follow the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement, ensuring fair compensation, benefits, and long-term stability.
* 🌍 Diverse Industry Exposure Work on high-impact projects across Telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking, gaining experience that spans multiple sectors.
* 🚀 Accelerated Career Growth Whether you're a seasoned developer or an emerging tech leader, we offer continuous learning, challenging assignments, and leadership opportunities to help you grow fast and grow smart.
* 🤝 Culture of Collaboration & Curiosity Join a team that values innovation, inclusion, and integrity. At VIPAS, your ideas matter, your voice is heard, and your growth is celebrated.


 📬 How to Apply
   

  

 Ready to make an impact? Send your
 **resume** 
 to kumud@vipas.se. We review applications continuously—so don’t wait!
   

  

 ⚠️
 **Note** 
 :
 **Only candidates with Sweden PR/citizenship or a valid work permit will be considered.**
 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. So, if a role speaks to you, apply immediately!

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
**Who We’re Looking For**
 Are you passionate about web technologies and programming? Do you have an interest in the stock market and investing? If so, this could be the perfect opportunity for you. We are looking for a Full Stack Developer who’s based in Sweden with a valid work permit to join our Web App team.
   

  

 As part of the Web App development team, you will collaborate closely with engineers, product managers, and designers. You’ll also interact with customer relations, marketing, and sales. This is a truly end-to-end role: you’ll design, build, and ship features across the stack, from backend services and APIs to sleek, responsive UIs. Your work will directly shape the user experience and help scale our rapidly growing platform.
   

  

**Why join Quartr**
**Do your life's work:** 
 We focus passionately on doing things with a very high quality across our entire organization.
   

  

**Join the foundational team:** 
 We are still in the very early innings of what we believe to be a multi-decade journey.
   

  

**Skin in the game:** 
 We truly believe in the power of incentives and in sharing the company's success with the team. Therefore, every employee is offered qualified stock options.
   

  

**Rapid, global growth:** 
 Among our clients are some of the world's most influential companies in finance and tech. With proven products and go-to-market strategy, we're steadily grabbing market share in a multi-billion dollar industry.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Take end-to-end ownership of features: design, implement, and deploy both backend and frontend parts.
* Contribute to the architecture and scalability of our backend services.
* Build responsive and performant UIs that users love.
* Collaborate closely with product and design to shape features from concept to release.
* Continuously improve our codebase, tools, and workflows.


**Required Skills**
 We believe you’ll thrive if you:
   

  

* Have solid experience in frontend and backend development (ideally with modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks).
* Enjoy working on end-to-end feature development, and you write clean and maintainable code.
* Actively contribute to a friendly, collaborative work environment.
* Feel comfortable in a high-tempo environment where priorities can shift quickly.
* Are fluent in English (our company language), both written and spoken.


**Desired qualities**
* Be self-driven, proactive, and take full ownership of your projects
* Communicate clearly and effectively, thriving in a high-paced, collaborative environment
* An interest in finance and the financial markets is a big plus
* Adapt quickly to new technologies and frameworks, with curiosity to explore tools like Bun and Elysia as we evolve our stack.
* Balance pragmatism with craftsmanship, knowing when to move fast and when to build for long-term scalability.


**What We Offer**
* Competitive salary
* Company option plan
* Top-notch equipment of your choice
* Wellness allowance
* Occupational pension
* Flexible work arrangements (remote or on-site in Stockholm/Gothenburg)
* Must be based in Sweden with a valid work permit


 By joining Quartr, you'll be part of a rapid growth story in the global investor relations space, where no day is like the other – in a good way.
   

  

**Note: We are not seeking assistance from consultants or recruitment agencies.**
**About Quartr**
 Every day, leading companies and financial institutions worldwide rely on Quartr to make better decisions faster. The product suite includes: Quartr API, enabling third parties to build custom solutions powered by Quartr's unique live earnings calls and transcription technology, and its extensive global database of IR material – including public company filings, archived earnings call transcripts, and slide deck presentations. Quartr Pro, a desktop research platform that increases efficiency and precision in qualitative public market research for top hedge funds, asset managers, equity research departments, and IR professionals. A free mobile app allowing users to always stay informed and conduct research anytime, anywhere.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Want to be part of this team? Of course you do! 👇🏾
   

  

 Are you a skilled Software Engineer who wants to build modern, scalable products that make a real impact on people’s health and well-being? Do you have an interest in AI and want to work at the forefront of digital health? Then OneLab might be your next adventure.
   

  

**About The Role**
 OneLab is one of the fastest-growing companies in the Nordics within SaaS and occupational health. Our platform supports over 75,000 employees and 500+ companies globally – helping organizations detect health risks early and provide medical follow-up at the right time, with the support of digital tools and AI.
   

  

 We are now looking for a Software Engineer to join our growing tech team. You’ll be working across the stack, collaborating with colleagues in engineering, design and product. Your work will directly contribute to improving health outcomes and transforming how companies care for their people.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Build and scale our modern health-tech platform using TypeScript, Node.js, React/Svelte, and AWS.
* Collaborate with product, medical, sales and customer success teams to deliver high-impact features.
* Work with clean, maintainable code and contribute to good architectural decisions.
* Take part in evolving our platform with a focus on performance, reliability, and smart automation.
* Learn and apply AI-related tools and techniques where relevant – we don’t expect expertise, but curiosity and a willingness to learn are key.


**OUR STACK**
* Frontend: React, Svelte, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
* Backend/API: Node.js, Next.js, TypeScript, tRPC
* Database: MySQL, MongoDB,Redis
* Infrastructure: AWS, Kubernetes, Docker


**What We’re Looking For**
* A few years of experience working as a fullstack or frontend-focused software engineer.
* Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and modern development practices.
* An interest in (or experience) with AI/ML applications is a big plus.
* A collaborative mindset and strong communication skills.
* Fluent in English (Swedish is not required).
* Experience from health-tech or related domains is a bonus, but not necessary.


**What We Offer**
* Be part of a fast-growing, mission-driven company.
* Work alongside a kind, driven, and high-performing team that values quality and impact.
* Help shape the engineering culture and product direction.
* Gain hands-on experience with AI integration in a real-world, high-impact environment.
* Hybrid setup: Work from our Stockholm HQ (next to Central Station) at least 3 days/week – with flexibility for remote work the rest of the time.


**JOIN US**
 We’re building something meaningful – not just for our customers, but for the future of preventive health. If you’re driven, curious, and want your code to make a real difference, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Frontend Developer / Product Engineer
description:
*Do you want to build a product that is loved by its users?*
*StoreSprint is looking for a Front-end Developer / Product Engineer who wants to work on building the best platform for digitalization in retail operations.*
**What is StoreSprint?**
 To understand better what we do, imagine working in a store. When you come to work, you need to keep track of daily workflows, routine tasks and issues. If you work in a typical store, you might need to check off long checklists in excel, check your schedule in a calendar app and speak with colleagues in a chat app. Most likely, you will have to work in a plethora of different tools that don’t fit well together.
   

  

 The problem is that this experience is extremely messy for the employee. StoreSprint is the one stop shop for co-worker productivity. We are today used by 15,000 employees in companies like ICA, Rusta, Coop, and Hemköp. These organizations use our platform to make sure that everything is running efficiently. We provide a product that covers everything a typical employee needs to do during the day. No more moving from spreadsheets to whatsapp and logging time in a third tool.
   

  

 Our focus from the start has always been to win by providing the best user experience. That’s where you come in as a front-end engineer. We are looking for someone that loves building products. Someone that is inspired by products that feel perfect for the users. We are inspired by companies like Linear, who really care about the details that make a product great.
   

  

**Your typical day**
 Our culture is low on processes and high on agency. We will give you ownership. On a typical day, you will be working on a new feature end-to-end, or improving an existing one. You get feedback from users, you ship meaningful improvements to users.
   

  

**Skills And Requirements**
* You have experience working in a product led organization.
* You like ownership. You thrive in an environment where you make decisions end to end when developing the product.
* You are familiar with building frontends in React and React Native, as well as designing in Figma.


**Offer**
 We offer a competitive salary and a truly product led team. We all obsess over product and care about the end user experience. We have a really nice office in Södermalm in Stockholm and have a flexible remote work policy.

title: E-commerce Frontend Developer
description:
**Hi there! 👋**
 At Grebban, we’re on a mission to create exceptional e-commerce experiences, and we’d love for you to be part of it. We’re a close-knit team that works alongside our clients to truly understand their needs, using our e-commerce expertise to help them reach their goals. If you’re passionate about creating great user experiences, love problem-solving, and are eager to learn and grow –keep reading!
   

  

 We’re looking for a front-end developer with a few years of experience (bonus points if it’s in e-commerce), who has a talent in React.js and wants to work on innovative, client-focused solutions. You’ll be part of a collaborative, supportive team, working closely with designers, backend developers, strategists, and—most importantly—our clients to bring amazing ideas to life.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
 In this role, you’ll work directly with our clients and internal teams to create, adapt, and implement solutions that solve real business challenges. You’ll be at the heart of understanding our clients’ needs, making smart technical decisions, and building scalable, future-proof solutions that help their businesses grow.
   

  

 You’ll analyze business processes, create custom solutions, and guide clients through every step of the development process. Collaboration is key, so you’ll also work closely with other teams to ensure everything integrates smoothly and meets high technical standards.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
* A few years of experience in a similar role (bonus if you’ve worked in e-commerce or with headless solutions like Next.js or Gatsby!).
* Strong skills in core web technologies—HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js—with a good understanding of TypeScript.
* Someone who loves building high-performance, intuitive user interfaces and solving complex problems.
* A team player who enjoys collaborating with others and getting the best results together.
* Someone who is familiar with tools like styled-components, Redux, GraphQL, or any other modern web dev technologies!


**We believe you are**
* Curious and always looking for ways to learn and grow in your career.
* Someone who thrives in a team environment and loves sharing knowledge with others.
* Client-focused and passionate about creating solutions that make a real difference
* to the businesses and brands you work with.
* Comfortable communicating in both English and Swedish, whether it’s with your team or directly with clients
* Experienced working with version control systems.


**Why you’ll love it here**
 We’re proud of our open, welcoming culture where everyone’s ideas and perspectives are valued. We believe that the best ideas come from diversity, and we’re always excited to hear what you bring to the table. We’re a team that values collaboration and making an impact, both for our clients and for each other.
   

  

**Here’s what else you can expect:**
* Close collaboration with clients to create innovative solutions that matter.
* A supportive, fun team that loves to share knowledge and grow together.
* Flexible work options—whether that’s working from home or collaborating in person.
* Opportunities to continue learning, growing, and developing in a role that supports your career journey.
* To make friends for life and have the most exciting years of your career!


**Sound like a good fit?**
 If this sounds like something you’d love to be part of and contribute to, we want to hear from you. Apply today!

title: Fullstack Developer - Team Buying
description:
Tradera is a purpose-driven company with a belief that consumption has a significant impact on our planet. We are determined to use what we can control - our business, our voice, our creativity, and our platform - to take action.
   

  

 At Tradera, we are on a mission to "Drive the Transition to Sustainable Shopping" by changing the way people consume and resell preloved goods. Our technical platform is an enabler in facilitating this shift. Together, we are building large, distributed, and scalable systems capable of handling vast amounts of data. With more than five million weekly visits and 300 bids per second during peak traffic, our technical solutions face significant demands.
   

  

 To continue our mission, we need more people to join us!
   

  

**About the team:**
 We are currently seeking a fullstack developer to join our Buying Team at Tradera. In this role, you will collaborate with dedicated developers who are responsible for crafting customer-facing applications serving thousands of users across the Nordic region. You will have the opportunity to engage with the entire technical stack and influence its ongoing development.
   

  

 Your work will involve seamless coordination with our tech, product management, and UX teams to propel the next generation of our user-facing applications. You will play a pivotal role in tackling complex challenges and devising elegant, straightforward solutions that enhance the world-class experience on Tradera.com.
   

  

 Additionally, we take pride in fostering a friendly learning culture, where we actively encourage continuous growth and development among our team members.
   

  

**Example of responsibilities:**
* Build and maintain next generation scalable web applications
* Bind our frontend and backend services together
* Define and implement new platform initiatives and push Tradera’s web stack forward
* Collaborate with software engineers, product management, UX, and operational teams
* Ensure that our users’ experience is the very best it can be
* You will work with languages and technologies such as .NET Core/C#, JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, RabbitMQ, MongoDB, Google Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes and more.


**Who are you?**
* 5+ years of professional experience within web development in product-driven environments
* Experience in React.js and .NET/C#
* You know how to build user-friendly JavaScript/CSS applications
* Comfortable with tooling, build pipelines and getting code into production
* You have a Swedish residence permit or work visa to work in Sweden or within EU.


 At Tradera we offer competitive salaries and benefits like a yearly bonus and a generous pot for competence development. But most of all, you’ll get a little extra when you join us! Like a group of talented people who really love what we do and with strong belief that people deserve a smooth way to care about the planet!
   

  

 Come and join us – Don’t be square, get circular!

title: Backend developer
description:
We are looking for senior backend engineers to join us and expand our team of talented backend developers. You share a passion for building systems that delivers high business value without sacrificing maintainability, availability, scalability and quality. You will work on the backend systems that power our casino platform and help us deliver the best customer experience.
   

  

**Job Description**
* Design, develop and help operate our systems
* Drive technical improvements throughout the stack
* Together with product teams deliver the best games and business solutions
* Help scale our solution to customer requirements and business opportunities


 Who you are
   

  

* You have 5+ years of experience working in a mixed Java, SQL, Javascript environment
* Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent
* You are passionate about working in an environment of continuous learning
* You are curious, driven and not afraid to take charge and improve the system and add automation where needed
* Taking on technical challenges and solving them is something you take pride in
* You have experience from working on large Java systems and have a solid understanding of performance, scalability and availability challenges of distributed systems
* Quality, not only of the code you write, but the delivered system is important to you
* You thrive in an environment where you are responsible for your code and takes ownership of the change from editor to production system
* You know your way around a modern Unix/Linux system
* Experience with modern deployment, monitoring and logging solutions


 Who we are
   

  

 We are the best and fastest growing slot provider in the world with the operator and product in focus, and the mobile future on our minds. Nolimit is a team of experienced professionals from the gambling industry in Stockholm, Sweden, Malta and Gurugram, India. Our company has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. Our mission is to offer a fast, reliable and flexible team that cooperates with the best operators in the world, taking gambling to the next level.
   

  

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. Since we have our own platform, this allows us to deliver special features and smooth, customizable marketing campaigns that are tailored to the operator's specific needs. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
   

  

 Send your application to hr@nolimitcity.com
   

  

 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Backend Developer
description:
At Ingrid, we’re not just building software—we’re transforming how people experience delivery. Our platform powers seamless, intelligent logistics solutions for merchants and customers worldwide. As we continue to grow, we’re looking for a motivated backend developer to join our team and help us expand our plugin integrations for Ingrid’s return, checkout, and tracking products.
   

  

**Why You’ll Want to Build With Us**
**Work With Go and Modern Tools**
 We’re a Go-first company with a microservices architecture. You’ll get hands-on experience with modern backend technologies and learn how to build efficient, scalable services.
   

  

**Contribute to Real Products**
 You’ll be developing and improving plugins that connect Ingrid’s products to merchant systems—directly impacting how retailers and customers experience delivery.
   

  

**Learn and Grow With the Team**
 You’ll collaborate with experienced engineers, gaining mentorship and guidance while contributing your own ideas. We value learning, knowledge sharing, and supporting each other’s growth.
   

  

**Modern Stack**
* Cloud Native: Google Cloud, Kubernetes
* Observability: Prometheus, Grafana
* Data Layer: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis, Google PubSub
* Dev Experience: GitHub, GitHub Actions, Terraform
* Delivery Culture: Continuous delivery and iteration


**Experience**
**What We’re Looking For**
* 2–4 years of experience in backend development
* Comfortable working with at least one backend language (Go, PHP, Java, Python, or TypeScript are especially relevant).
* Some familiarity with APIs, integrations, or plugin development is a plus.
* Previous experience with plugin development for e-commerce platforms such as Shopify, Magento or WooCommerce is meritorious


**Mindset & Approach**
* Curious, proactive, and eager to learn.
* Enjoys problem-solving and building reliable, practical solutions.
* Collaborative team player with good communication skills.


**Education**
* Degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience.


**A Culture You’ll Thrive In**
* Trust & Growth: We give you responsibility and support you to grow in your role.
* Learning Mindset: We encourage experimenting, learning from feedback, and improving together.
* Flexibility & Balance: Remote-friendly setup, flexible hours, and generous vacation.
* Well-being & Security: Wellness allowance and occupational pension plan.
* Team Spirit: Knowledge-sharing sessions, team events, and a supportive environment.


**Ready to Make an Impact?**
 If you’re excited about developing integrations that shape the delivery experience and want to grow your skills with modern technologies in a collaborative environment, we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

**About Ingrid**
 Ingrid is a leading shipping software platform that empowers online retailers to offer seamless, personalized delivery experiences. Since 2015, we’ve helped over 250 retailers across Sweden increase conversion rates and build stronger customer loyalty.
   

  

 What makes us unique:
   

  

* Extensive network: 400+ shipping options and carriers across 80 countries and 42 languages.
* Customer-first: We see delivery as part of the shopping experience, not just the end of it.
* Data-driven: We provide valuable insights to help retailers optimize performance and pricing.
* Innovation: We constantly develop new features to stay ahead in e-commerce logistics.

title: Frontend Engineer
description:
At Intric, we're on a mission to let everyone benefit from generative AI by making the creation and deployment of AI-based tools easy, open, and secure. Our collaborative web application is already a trusted resource within the Swedish public sector and we’ll now be entering a pivotal growth phase. Join us now and be a core part of our ambitious journey.
   

  

**The Role**
 As a Frontend Engineer, you’ll lead the development of a fast, accessible and scalable web experience. Your work will range from building new features to refining our architecture, always with the end-user in focus. You'll collaborate closely with developers, product designers and business teams to continuously improve the platform across both desktop and mobile.
   

  

 Our tech stack consists of Node, TypeScript, HTML/CSS, Svelte/SvelteKit, Tailwind CSS. Infrastructure: Docker, Git, Jira
   

  

**The** 
**Team**
 You’ll be joining a cross-functional, fast-moving product team with a collaborative mindset. We keep processes lightweight and adapt as we go. You’ll have significant freedom to influence both technology and direction — and we value sharing, learning and pragmatic decisions above hierarchy or rigid frameworks.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 You have 3–5+ years of frontend engineering experience with a solid understanding of core web technologies (HTML/DOM, HTTP, JavaScript/TypeScript). Your experienced in building and scaling modern web applications and proficient in state management and caching (preferably in Svelte or similar frameworks).
   

  

 You can write efficient, maintainable, and accessible code with a collaborative mindset and strong communication skills.
   

  

 You might have a degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience.
   

  

 While not a must, experience with Svelte/SvelteKit and Tailwind CSS and familiarity with developer tooling and internal workflows is a plus.
   

  

**Perks**
* Flexible, trust-based work environment
* High degree of ownership and influence
* Work on meaningful technology with real societal impact
* A collaborative and curious team that values continuous learning

title: Engagement - Frontend Software Engineer
description:
Our Engagement Product Development team is growing and we are now looking for a Frontend Software Engineer to join! Engagement at Betsson Group ensures our customers come back for more. It’s all about loyalty. We provide a world class customer experience beyond the game play featuring Tournaments, Dynamic personalized campaigns and much more!
 



  
 


**A taster of what you will be involved with** 

 We want to be pioneers in a highly competitive market so we continuously strive for technical and product excellence. As part of our team, you will be building new products using latest technologies; actively contributing towards our multi-brand adaptive frontend platform, which is supporting our core brands.
 



 Our Frontend stack includes Angular 16, Angular Material (Desktop), TypeScript 4, Redux Pattern for State Management, RxJS, Sass, HTML5; and the frontend consumes RESTful APIs and Web Sockets. It’s a plus if you are curious about creating reusable custom web components, utilising libraries such as StencilJS.
 



 As a Frontend Developer, you will be part of a cross functional team within our Engagement area. You will be contributing directly to the success of our products by materializing our product teams' visions into a tangible user experience. You will participate in agile rituals such as planning, estimation, development, testing, code reviews, deploying great software, implementing new features as well as maintaining and improving the existing functionality.
   

  




**You are good at** 
* TypeScript and JavaScript
* At least one JavaScript Framework (Angular 7+, AngularJS, React+Redux, or Vue.js)
* HTML, CSS, Sass or LESS
* RESTful APIs
* Understanding of micro-frontend architecture
* Unit and Integration Tests (Jasmine, Jest, Karma)
* JavaScript tooling (webpack, rollup.js)
* Scalable and performant web applications
* Agile product development



  
 


**What we offer** 


 Much like a rollercoaster, life at Betsson Group is fast-paced, full of twists and turns, and always exciting. With more than
 **2,800** 
 colleagues representing over 75 nationalities
 **across a global network of offices** 
 - including
 **1,500** 
 at our operational headquarters in Malta - every day brings new challenges and opportunities to grow. It may not be for the faint-hearted, but if you thrive on innovation, enjoy pushing boundaries and want to be part of a diverse, international team, then you’ll fit right in at Betsson.
 




  
 


 Challenge accepted?
 
***By submitting your application, you understand that your personal data will be processed as set out in our Privacy Policy***

title: Game Developer
description:
****More independence, freedom, and better pay****
 Coody believes in combining the freedom and flexibility of freelancing with the security of traditional employment.
   

  

 It's not rocket science.
   

  

 Overpaid managers, fancy offices, and heavily burdened organizations are history.
   

  

 The tech talent of tomorrow deserves a new, independent, and well-paid standard.
   

  

 Welcome to what we call Gravity Free Consulting.
   

  

****Why Coody****
 At Coody, we cut out everything unnecessary to give more back to you as a consultant. And we have done it in the package of a slimmed and efficient organization, meaning no overpaid managers, no fancy offices and no luxurious conferences. But, what does this mean in practice?
   

  

**Maximized Compensation** 
 - Typically a +40% salary increase.
   

  

**Freedom & Flexibility** 
 - No bosses. All digital. Fully remote for those who prefer.
   

  

**Employment Security** 
 - Fixed salary, pension, insurance, paid vacation and a big educational fund.
   

  

**Shaping the Future** 
 - Projects and assignments for digital game changes like Mojang, Spotify, Volumental, Volvo Cars, Varjo, Toca Boca, Hemnet, and exciting startups and scaleups.
   

  

****This is Coody****
 We’re a diverse community of ambitious tech people from more than 14 nationalities working on exciting challenges with customers across Sweden, Finland, USA, and the UK in industries ranging from gaming, AR, EV, AI, Medtech and Fintech.
   

  

 Coody is more of a platform than a traditional consultancy. Everything we do, we do to make sure individuals working here can live according to their own priorities and unique ambitions. A consultant-first environment where you have better control over your career.
   

  

 Explore our
 **Employee Handbook** 
 and discover a company that actually puts consultants first.
   

  

****What you’ll be doing****
 As a consultant in Game Development at Coody, you’ll have the opportunity to work with some of the most inspiring digital entertainment companies in the world, in fields such as Games, AR/VR, Music, and other forms of interactive media. You’ll collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, artists, producers, and product managers.
   

  

 You’ll need to be adaptable and ready to hit the ground running in new environments. We see every challenge as an opportunity to grow. Typically, you’ll work on 1-2 assignments per year for companies in industries that you’re passionate about.
   

  

****Who you are****
 We’re after talented game developers who love to build immersive experiences and bring ideas to life. You thrive in fast-paced environments, enjoy pushing technical boundaries, and want the freedom to work on exciting projects - without the corporate nonsense.
   

  

* 5+ years of experience in software development.
* Hands-on experience with building games, VR/AR, or similar interactive experiences.
* Solid skills in modern C++, Lua, AngelScript, or web technologies.
* Experience from Unreal Engine (a bonus).
* A relevant degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Game Development, or similar.
* Based in Sweden - You must have Swedish citizenship, a valid work visa, or permanent residency.
* Fluent in English (spoken and written)


****How to apply****
 Are you excited to take your career to the next level and meet the criterias? Apply now, and we'll be in touch shortly.

title: Backend Developer / Platform Engineer
description:
StoreSprint is looking for a
 **Backend / Platform Engineer** 
 who wants to shape the foundation of the best platform for digitalization in retail operations.
   

  

 What is StoreSprint?
   

  

 To understand better what we do, imagine working in a store. When you come to work, you need to keep track of daily workflows, routine tasks and issues. If you work in a typical store, you might need to check off long checklists in Excel, check your schedule in a calendar app and speak with colleagues in a chat app. Most likely, you will have to work in a plethora of different tools that don’t fit well together.
   

  

 The problem is that this experience is extremely messy for the employee. StoreSprint is the one stop shop for co-worker productivity. We are today used by 15,000 employees in companies like ICA, Rusta, Coop, and Hemköp. These organizations use our platform to make sure that everything is running efficiently. We provide a product that covers everything a typical employee needs to do during the day. No more moving from spreadsheets to WhatsApp and logging time in a third tool.
   

  

 Our focus from the start has always been to win by providing the best user experience. To keep delivering on that promise, we need an infrastructure that scales smoothly, performs reliably, and can be trusted to handle critical retail operations. That’s where you come in.
   

  

 Your typical day
   

  

 Our culture is low on processes and high on agency. We will give you ownership. On a typical day, you might:
   

  

* Design and implement backend services in Node.js/TypeScript that scale with tens of thousands of daily users.
* Work with GraphQL and Prisma to optimize queries, schemas and data flows.
* Develop and expand our APIs and integration capabilities to enable ecosystem growth and seamless connections with partners, retailers, and third-party tools.
* Ensure our platform runs reliably on Google Cloud Run, with a strong focus on scalability, monitoring, and performance.
* Strengthen authentication and security using Auth0.
* Build CI/CD-pipelines
* Improve observability with tools like Sentry and Posthog, and refine deployment pipelines.
* Collaborate with frontend engineers (React Native) and product teams to ship new features end-to-end.


 You’ll see the direct impact of your work on users — whether it’s cutting response times in half, ensuring uptime during peak hours, or opening up new integrations that expand the value of our platform.
   

  

**Skills And Requirements**
* Experience working in a product-led organization.
* Strong backend experience with Node.js and TypeScript.
* Familiarity with GraphQL, Prisma, and relational databases.
* Experience running production workloads on GCP (Cloud Run or similar managed services).
* Knowledge of CI/CD, monitoring, and testing for high-reliability environments.
* Experience building APIs, SDKs, or integrations for ecosystem growth.
* You like ownership. You thrive in an environment where you make decisions end-to-end when developing the platform.


 Tools we use
   

  

 Slack, Linear, Sentry, Posthog, Cursor, ChatGPT, and more.
   

  

 Offer
   

  

 We offer a competitive salary and a truly product-led team. We all obsess over product quality and end user experience, whether in UI or infrastructure. We have a really nice office in Södermalm in Stockholm and a flexible remote work policy.

title: Utvecklare - Core Platform
description:
Vill du vara med och forma nästa generations streamingupplevelse som används av miljontals tittare varje dag? Hos TV4 möts teknik, innovation och underhållning - just nu söker vi utvecklare till deras team inom Core Platform.
   

  

**Core Platform** 
 ansvarar för att bygga och vidareutveckla den tekniska grunden som hela TV4:s utvecklingsorganisation arbetar utifrån. Det innebär fokus på områden som plattformsteknik, infrastruktur, säkerhet och verktyg som stöttar utvecklingsmiljön. Teamets uppdrag är att skapa förutsättningar för snabba och säkra leveranser, oavsett om det gäller CI/CD-pipelines, utvecklingsmiljöer, core-tjänster eller interna plattformar.
   

  

 I den här rollen blir du en nyckelperson i ett team där du får arbeta tillsammans med andra kunniga kollegor i en miljö som värdesätter kvalitet, stabilitet och innovation. TV4 arbetar kontinuerligt med att förbättra både deras tekniska plattformar och arbetssätt, och just nu befinner de sig på en spännande resa där AI integreras som ett hjälpande verktyg i utvecklingsprocessen.
   

  

**Vad du kommer att göra**
* Bygga interna verktyg och bibliotek för att möjliggöra samt förenkla DevOps-arbete i andra utvecklingsteam
* Designa skalbara mikrotjänster med fokus på prestanda, säkerhet och driftbarhet.
* CI/CD-pipelines, tester och observability samt se till att kod deployas snabbt och tryggt.
* Hitta nya och effektiva arbetssätt.
* Driva och äga projekt och spännande features tillsammans med kollegor med olika kompetenser.


**Om dig**
 För att trivas och lyckas hos TV4 är du nyfiken, initiativrik och motiveras av att ständigt förbättra arbetssätt och lösningar. Du är van att samarbeta med andra team och trivs i en miljö där teknik, användarupplevelse och kvalitet går hand i hand. Vidare ser vi gärna att du har erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Fullstack-utveckling: Teamet jobbar främst i Go eller Node.js samt Typescript. Vi ser gärna att du har en vana att bygga stabila och skalbara API:er och mikrotjänster.
* Cloud & DevOps: Erfarenhet av AWS (eller annan molnplattform), infrastruktur som kod (IaC), CI/CD-pipelines och verktyg för observability.
* Plattformsutveckling / Developer Experience: Du har byggt och underhållit interna verktyg, bibliotek, pipelines eller API:er som används av andra utvecklingsteam.
* AI Engineering: Du har ett intresse för eller erfarenhet av att arbeta med AI-teknik i praktiska tillämpningar.


**Det är ett stort plus om du också har:**
* Erfarenhet av datasäkerhet
* Erfarenhet av Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)


**Mer om erbjudandet**
 Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm med gångavstånd till Gärdets tunnelbana. Kontoret erbjuder eget gym, parkeringsgarage, restaurang samt takterrass. Rollen erbjuder även:
   

  

* Kollektivavtal, med tjänstepension, friskvårdsbidrag m.m
* Vara en del av TV4s ekosystem och ta del av de tjänster som TV4 erbjuder sina kunder
* Rabatter via Benify
* Kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling


 Ansökan & process
   

  

 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och intervjuer från mitten av Augusti, men skicka gärna in din ansökan redan idag! Den tjänsten tillsätts i samarbete med Safemind.
   

  

 Bakgrundskontroll och test via AlvaLabs kan ingå i processen.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Senior C# Developer
description:
**About The Role**
 We are looking for a BE-heavy Fullstack Developer to help shape the future of Wisentics core platform Arbit - a system that helps insurance companies, and their customers, manage administrative processes within claims handling, auto glass claims, and pet insurance more efficiently. You will be instrumental in driving the technical development, making key design decisions, and helping in reducing legacy while building a sustainable, future-proof SaaS product.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Here, you’ll play a key role in taking Arbit to the next level. As part of a small development team, you’ll help create solutions that truly make an impact — both for today’s users and for the future.
* Design, develop, and maintain backend systems using .NET 8 and newer versions.
* Collaborate with the development team to make informed technical decisions and lead modernization initiatives.
* Enhance balance by integrating new features into existing systems.
* Engage with product and business teams to understand customer needs and deliver impactful solutions.
* Reduce technical debt and contribute to establishing a scalable, maintainable architecture.


**About You**
 We are looking for a proactive and solution-oriented individual who:
   

  

* Has extensive experience in .NET/C# backend development, preferably within SaaS and microservices environments.
* Is comfortable working across the full stack and open to engaging with frontend technologies like Angular.
* Possesses experience with cloud platforms, with a preference for Azure.
* Can independently break down complex user stories and lead technical initiatives.
* Is curious, eager to learn, and stays updated on modern technology trends.


 What we offer
   

  

 Wisentic is a SaaS scale-up with more than 30 years of experience in the auto, pet and health claims space. We have proven products and are now expanding into new markets while continuously improving our delivery and experience.
   

  

* Opportunity to work in a dynamic growth company.
* Talented colleagues ready to support the success in your career path.
* Social events with your colleagues (breakfast, candy-time, afterwork etc.).
* Wellness allowance.
* Hybrid working model and the flexibility to work three days from the office and two days remote.

title: App utvecklare - React Native
description:
På Compileit brinner vi för att skapa innovativa lösningar främst inom app- och webbutveckling som verkligen gör en positiv inverkan. Genom vår expertis har vi hjälpt flera stora aktörer såsom
 **Skistar, ICA, Barncancerfonden** 
 och
 **Hästens** 
 att nå nya höjder. Nu står vi inför fler spännande projekt och söker därmed en app-utvecklare som vill bli en del av vårt växande team.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som apputvecklare hos oss kommer du att ha en central roll i vårt utvecklingsteam. Du kommer att arbeta nära andra utvecklare, projektledare och designers för att bygga intuitiva och skalbara mobilappar, med inriktning på React Native och alltid med användaren i fokus. Testning och kontinuerlig integration/leverans utgör också centrala områden inom projektet. Utöver att delta i kundmöten kommer du behöva använda ditt konsultativa mindset för att lösa komplexa problem.
   

  

**Du kommer till exempel att:**
* Utveckla mobilapplikationer med React Native
* Omsätta designskisser till funktionella, effektiva och snygga appar
* Arbeta tillsammans med UX/UI designers för att skapa bästa möjliga användarupplevelse
* Skriva testbar, strukturerad och ren kod
* Integrera tredjeparts API:er
* Delta i sprintplaneringar, standups och retros


**🛠️ Vår tech stack**
 Vi väljer alltid teknik utifrån vad som passar bäst för varje projekt och vi gillar att ligga i framkant. Inom apputveckling arbetar vi främst med React Native, men vi utforskar ständigt nya verktyg och ramverk för att skapa moderna och hållbara lösningar.
   

  

**Några av de tekniker vi ofta använder i våra projekt är:**
* React Native
* TypeScript
* Expo
* Firebase
* Node.js & Serverless
* Tailwind
* Next.js & PlanetScale


**Är detta något för dig?**
 Vi söker dig som har en prestigelös inställning och alltid är nyfiken på att lära dig nya saker. Du trivs i en snabbt föränderlig miljö med snabba beslut, kontinuerlig leverans där du får vara kreativ och arbeta agilt.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som:**
* Har minst 1-2 års erfarenhet av apputveckling med React Native
* Har en relevant utbildning, t.ex. inom datavetenskap, systemutveckling eller liknande
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska
* Trivs med att jobba agilt och iterativt
* Har ett öga för både teknik och användarupplevelse


**Varför Compileit?**
 Att snabbt utveckla enkla lösningar på till synes komplicerade problem styr vår kulturella personlighet. Vi gillar att dela med oss av kunskap och göra skillnad för människor som verkligen betyder något, vi vill göra samhällsnytta på riktigt!
   

  

 Vårt kontor ligger centralt och här har du närhet till alla tänkbara kommunikationer. Enkelhet är vårt mantra, givetvis slipper du tidsrapportering hos oss.
   

  

**Vad får du som anställd hos oss?**
 ☀️ 6 veckors semester
   

  

 ⛷️ Maxat friskvårdsbidrag
   

  

 👩🏽‍💻 Generösa arbetsverktyg
   

  

 🏢 Centralt kontor i Stockholm
   

  

 🚚 Flyttdag
   

  

 👵🏼 Tjänstepension (8 % avsättning via SEB från 25 års ålder)
   

  

 🚀 Stort utrymme att påverka, du är en medskapare av vår framtid
   

  

**Startdatum**
 Vi söker alltid duktiga utvecklare och just nu söker vi utvecklare både för pågående projekt och för framtida uppdrag. Vi intervjuar löpande, så tveka inte att höra av dig redan idag!
