title: Software Engineer
description:
På qte jobbar strax över 50 problemlösare som hjälper företag att boosta sina affärer med hjälp av tech. Vi skräddarsyr digitala lösningar som tar företagen framåt, och gör allt från mobilapplikationer till komplexa it-system. Vi är stolta vinnare av en Di-gasell, och ännu mer stolta över vår placering som Sveriges 6:e bästa arbetsplats i IT-branschen. Här jobbar bland andra utvecklare, designers, strateger och projektledare, och nu vill vi utöka våra teams med fler mjukvaruutvecklare.
   

  

 Vi letar efter dig som har arbetat med mjukvaruutveckling i några år och har högskoleexamen samt god förståelse för hur man driver lyckade mjukvaruprojekt. Förutom att du har ett driv och passion för utveckling tar du ansvar för den kod du levererar och hjälper gärna dina mer juniora medarbetare framåt. I denna tjänst är du med och tar beslut tillsammans med ditt team och tar stort ägandeskap för vad ni producerar. Det är en roll som låter dig ta nästa steg i din karriär.
   

  

 Som mjukvaruutvecklare på qte handlar jobbet om mycket mer än bara utveckling. Vi väntar oss att du är en problemlösare som använder tech som ett sätt att lösa våra kunders utmaningar. För det behöver du ha stark affärsförståelse och förmågan att anpassa tekniska lösningar för att möta specifika affärsbehov. Du kommer jobba i en utmanande miljö där kunder och kollegor har höga förväntningar på ditt arbete, så det är viktigt att du tycker det är kul och drivs av hitta lösningar på komplexa problem.
   

  

 Som anställd på qte handlar jobbet om mycket mer än bara jobb. Vi är en arbetsplats där du utmanas, utvecklas och har roligt tillsammans med dina kollegor. Många väljer att börja hos oss tack vare den välkomnande, avslappnade stämningen vi har, som du känner av direkt när du besöker oss. Vi vill vara en arbetsplats som vi själva vi jobba på, och det innebär bland annat att vi jobbar när och var vi vill och att vi har frivilliga, gemensamma aktiviteter varje månad. Vi är inte Sveriges 6:e bästa arbetsplats utan anledning!
   

  

**Vem du är:**
* Minst 3 års relevant erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling samt erfarenhet av att skriva kod av hög kvalitet som går att underhålla under en lång tid.
* Har stark problemlösningsförmåga.
* Har starka kunskaper i programmeringsspråk såsom TypeScript, Java, Go, eller C# samt erfarenhet av att arbeta med databaser och komplexa datamodeller.
* Har förmåga att förstå och tillämpa affärsprinciper i tekniska lösningar.
* Har förmåga att effektivt kommunicera tekniska koncept till icke-tekniska stakeholders.
* Är bekväm med att kommunicera på svenska till kunder och kollegor.


**Vad du kommer jobba med:**
* Utveckla mjukvarulösningar: Skapa och implementera anpassade mjukvarulösningar i Typescript/NodeJS. Var aktiv i hela utvecklingsprocessen, från design till implementation och support.
* Affärsutveckling: Använd din förståelse för affärsprocesser och branschspecifika utmaningar för att designa lösningar som möter kundens behov och bidrar till deras framgång.
* Kundkommunikation: Arbeta nära kunder för att förstå deras affärsmål och översätta dessa till tekniska krav.
* Problemlösning: Anpassa dig snabbt till nya teknologier och affärsmiljöer. Visa upp starka problemlösningsförmågor i utmanande projekt.
* Samarbete och ledarskap: Arbeta i tvärfunktionella team och bidra till en positiv och produktiv arbetsmiljö. Visa upp ledaregenskaper när situationen kräver det. Coacha och stötta andra utvecklare.


**Övrigt:**
 Denna position kräver starka kommunikationsfärdigheter på både svenska och engelska. Vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning. Du bör även vara bosatt i Sverige.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Låter det som din nästa utmaning? Sök redan idag eftersom vi anställer löpande.
   

  

**qte är en strategisk techpartner som hjälper företag att boosta sina affärer med hjälp av tech. Vi skräddarsyr digitala lösningar som tar företag framåt, och gör allt från mobilapplikationer till komplexa it-system. Som techpartner arbetar vi långsiktigt och kontinuerligt med kunder som DHL, Koenigsegg och Världens Barn. 2023 stod qte som vinnare av en Di-gasell och 2024 blev vi utsedda till Sveriges 6:e bästa arbetsplats inom IT-branschen. Sedan 2024 är qte en del av Qvik Group.**

title: Fullstack Developer - Node
description:
**At Hemnet, we’re not just building Sweden’s leading property platform – we’re shaping how people find their future homes. Now we’re looking for a Senior Fullstack Developer who’s excited about Node, service oriented architecture, and making a real impact.** 
  

  

**The Role** 
  

  

 You’ll join a cross-functional team where your voice matters. As a senior developer, you’ll not only write great code but also help drive architectural discussions, mentoring teammates, and helping us move towards a modern, flexible platform.
   

  

 We’re on a journey towards a service oriented architecture, and your experience here will be key. You’ll work hands-on with Node and React (while also touching Ruby) and bring ideas that push us forward.
   

  

**What You’ll Do** 
  

  

 The team is responsible for the authentication solution and is currently focusing on personalization for our users. In this role, you’ll
   

  

* Contribute to both backend and frontend development (Node.js, Ruby, React)
* Help shape our architecture as we move towards a service oriented architecture
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and fellow engineers
* Share knowledge and inspire the team
* Bring your personality and perspective to make the team stronger and more diverse


  

  

**Who You Are** 
  

  

 We believe you are experienced in working with Node and React, but also that you are open to learning Ruby. You enjoy guiding, coaching, and sparking great discussions as well as value collaboration, diversity, and creating smart solutions together.
   

  

* You have senior-level experience as a Fullstack Developer
* Experience working in Node.js
* You’re willing to learn Ruby
* You’ve worked with large-scale applications and know the challenges of breaking down a monolith into a service oriented architecture


  

  

**I am your new manager 👋** 
  

  

 Hi!
   

  

 My name is Staffan, and I’ll be your new manager. I’ve been at Hemnet since 2019 but just recently joined our domain called Consumers. I’m really excited to support the teams that will be working on many new and important areas for Hemnet – including personalization and smarter search features.
   

  

 My leadership style is listening, transparent, accessible, and supportive, while also challenging you to take your next step. Hopefully, we’ll learn a lot from each other and have plenty of fun as we break new ground at Hemnet. As a team, we get things done; we know when and where value can be added, and we’re clear on our priorities.
   

  

 Why did I decide to join Hemnet? I was strongly drawn to the culture and atmosphere – a wonderful combination of kindness, inclusiveness, and helpfulness, paired with high ambitions and a strong drive forward. My impression is that the people and the workplace together create the perfect foundation for you to do the best work of your career.
   

  

 At Hemnet, we believe tech is better when built together. If you want to shape not only code but also the future of Sweden’s most loved housing platform, we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

**A Note on Inclusion 💚** 
  

  

 At Hemnet, we believe that diversity in gender, sexual orientation, ability, neurodiversity, cultural background and life experience makes us stronger. We welcome applicants of all identities and backgrounds.
   

  

 If you meet many but not all of the requirements, we encourage you to apply. We value curiosity, a strong sense of purpose and the motivation to learn and grow, alongside your skills and experiences.
   

  

**🏡 Your career at Hemnet** 
  

  

 With over 40 million visits each month, you’ll be part of Sweden’s most popular property platform – and one of the world’s most admired real estate platforms. But our size and reputation aren’t the only reasons why you and your 150+ colleagues enjoy working here.
   

  

 Since 1998, Hemnet has been an essential go-to place for millions of Swedes, guiding them through one of life’s biggest transitions: finding a new place to call home. We’re proud to make this life-changing, often stressful journey as seamless as possible.
   

  

 With access to vast amounts of data, you’ll have limitless opportunities to explore and create new features that enhance the experience for Sweden’s real estate agents, home buyers, and sellers.
   

  

 Our friendly Hemnet culture fosters a dynamic, playful environment where every voice is valued. Here, you’ll join a welcoming team that encourages you to thrive and grow, working alongside passionate colleagues from around the world.
   

  

**A Hybrid Way of Working** 
  

  

 Our vibrant office in central Stockholm is the hub of our collaboration and culture, providing a lively space that fosters team spirit. We come together in the office three days a week, with two flexible remote days. To be part of our team, it’s essential to be based in or near Stockholm.

title: Senior Software Engineer
job_function: Engineering, Information Technology, and Product Management
company_industry: Software Development, IT System Custom Software Development, and Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
**Senior-/Lead Engineer | Permanent | Hybrid | Stockholm** 




  





 For our client, a SaaS company from Stockholm, we are currently looking for a Senior-/Lead Engineer who can lead technically and be a role model to other Engineers.
 



  





 Do you love building well tested and stable applications?
 



 Do you believe that “teamwork makes the dream work”?
 



 As a Developer you can lead the charge and are no stranger to helping others around you?
 



  





 Then this opportunity might be for you!
 



  





**Your Impact** 




 You will be working tightly with both frontend and backend developers on the API and core functionalities, as well as building out the backbone of the platform, which is written in Ruby on Rails. You will challenge the current architecture, deploy improvements it and to the overall processes and systems. You will help coach the development team on best practices and help them grow along with the company. The goal is to have a well-tested and well-architected platform to build on for years to come and this role will have a large impact on how they can best accomplish this.
 



  




* **Lead with Innovation:** 
 Design, develop, and implement improvements that will be the foundation of the platform for years to come.
* **Mentor and Inspire:** 
 Guide and coach fellow developers, sharing your expertise to elevate the entire team’s skills and best practices.
* **Drive Quality:** 
 Ensure that the platform is not only well-tested and stable but also ready to support ambitious growth plans.



  





 Your contributions will have a lasting impact on the platform’s success, helping them to deliver world-class solutions to their clients.
 



  





**What you need** 



* +5 yrs of exp. in Node.JS & TypeScript
* Exp. maintaining and improving upon large code bases
* Exp. working with / writing test suites
* Experience with Postgres and optimizing it



  





**Nice-to-haves** 



* Ruby (On Rails) is a plus
* GraphQL is a plus
* AWS is a plus
* React is a plus



  





**What they offer** 



* A fast-growing startup culture on an ambitious mission to digitalize businesses world-wide
* A diverse team of talented and supportive colleagues
* Competitive compensation package
* Centrally located office in Stockholm
* Six weeks of paid vacation
* Pension at ITP1 levels
* Generous wellness grant and weekly training sessions with personal trainer
* Private healthcare insurance
* Chose you own machine!



  





**Ready to Make an Impact? Apply Now!** 




 We’re conducting interviews on a rolling basis, so don’t wait to apply.

title: Senior .NET Developer
description:
****Who we are and what we do:****
 At Viedoc, we design engaging software that modernizes clinical research so that necessary treatments can reach the people who need them faster.
   

  

 We accomplish this by combining technology and a creative design to streamline, automate and simplify conventional processes within clinical research. Simply put, Viedoc makes every aspect of a clinical study a bit smoother, resulting in greater discoveries that make a difference, and has the potential to improve lives.
   

  

 Real change means challenging the status quo – our driving force since we started almost two decades ago. In everything we do, we work for a healthier world, searching for better, more efficient solutions that answer to the needs of both our users and humanity.
   

  

**What you will do and why:**
 As a Senior .NET Developer, you will be part of an experienced and close-knit team with other developers, product owners, and testers, whose ambition is to constantly develop the core product and themselves. Together with your team, you will work with everything from product discovery to architecture-related issues. You will work agile and put information security and quality first. Our Tech Stack includes .NET, C#, Azure, ASP.NET Core and MySQL.
   

  

 This means you will be responsible for:
   

  

* Collaborating with developers, product owners, and testers to deliver high-quality software solutions.
* Design new scalable integration capabilities in our core services.
* Participating in all stages of development, from product discovery to deployment and maintenance.
* Ensuring information security and quality are prioritized throughout the development process.
* Contributing to system architecture decisions and addressing performance and scalability challenges.
* Working in an agile team, participating in sprints, stand-ups, and continuous improvement processes.


**Who are you?**
 We believe that you are passionate about software development. You love sharing your knowledge and want to celebrate both the small and the groundbreaking product breakthroughs with us. We also want you to have:
   

  

* +5 years of experience within .NET, C# and ASP.NET Core development.
* Good knowledge of cloud architecture and services (preferably Azure).
* Hands-on experience in shipping code through automation.
* Relevant education within IT or equivalent work experience.
* Fluent in English, both speech and writing.
* Eager to build software that accelerates life-saving clinical trials.


**Why you should work at** 
**Viedoc**
* Be a part of a company that is at the forefront of utilizing technology to make the world a better place by improving clinical trials
* Ability to work flexible hours and hybrid remote.
* Clearly defined development plans that allow you to grow
* The chance to work in the coolest office in Uppsala right by the central station


**Interested?**
 If you want to join our team, apply! Want to know more about why our product is important?
 **Check out the video on this page**

title: Backend Engineer, Health tech
description:
**Join us in shaping better Healthcare!**
 Platform24 is on a mission to unlock the potential of healthcare by creating a smooth and accessible healthcare where patients and caregivers are empowered by the most intelligent technology available.
   

  

 Joining our team as a Backend Engineer means playing a key role in one of Europe's most innovative health-tech companies, with the largest market adoption in the Nordics. You will have a significant impact and contribute to shaping the future of healthcare. Combining medical expertise with technology crafted by our engineers, we significantly improve healthcare quality and efficiency on a major scale.
   

  

 Our diverse team, consisting of frontend and backend engineers, an interaction designer, a product manager, and an engineering manager, collaborates closely to achieve these objectives.
   

  

 You and your team will have end-to-end ownership of your area of Platform24's solutions, which encompasses everything from the UI to backend services and DevOps.
   

  

 As a Senior Backend Engineer on the team, you'll have a critical role in shaping our innovative product. You will be at the forefront of designing, building, and implementing new features, contributing to architecture discussions, technology choices, and communicating technical topics to non-technical stakeholders. Your expertise will be crucial in enhancing our existing tech stack, which includes Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Kubernetes, Quarkus, and more...
   

  

**Responsibilities Of This Role Include...**
* Design, build, test, and deploy software as needed
* Support applications running in all environments
* Build and maintain code documentation and automated test suites
* Participate in improving ways of working in the team, engineering, and the company as a whole
* Troubleshoot and debug software
* Work with requirements stakeholders to design well-crafted solutions that meet expectations.
* Participate in an on-call rotation to respond to production issues
* Ensure that the code health of the software is on a level where the team can work efficiently
* Participate in knowledge spreading within engineering
* Teach and coach colleagues when appropriate
* Being a role model of values and company culture


 To succeed in this role, you will need...You're a team player who thrives in a cooperative environment. You're an experienced Java developer, highly skilled in Spring Boot and Quarkus. Your expertise in designing APIs and building microservices, and your knowledge of relational database design, MySQL, and JPA/Hibernate, will be invaluable in our mission to make healthcare better.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* Working collaboratively with diverse teams
* Working in a structured and systematic way
* Language learning courses
* Friendly environment, flexible work hours, and promote work-life balance


**Being Part Of The P24 Team**
 At Platform24, we understand that everyone has unique needs when it comes to organizing their lives. That's why we prioritize flexible working hours to promote work-life balance for all. Additionally, we host Demo & Beers sessions every other week, providing a platform to share our achievements (beers optional!). We prioritize personal growth and offer a range of benefits, including the opportunity to dedicate five workdays a year to volunteer work. Moreover, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate with intelligent, friendly, and talented colleagues from all over the world.
   

  

**Hear one of our teams tell you about the inner workings at Platform24:**
**Apply**
 If you believe we're the right workplace for you and you're the right fit for us, submit your application today! We conduct ongoing interviews, so we encourage you to apply soon..
   

  

 We are an equal-opportunity employer and value diversity. All employment decisions are based on qualifications, merit, and business needs.
   

  

 This role is a full-time employment with Platform24. We do not offer contractor and/or B2B types of engagements.
   

  

 Platform24 develops system support for cohesive digital care chains that facilitate increased accessibility, efficiency and medical security. We are the largest company in the Nordic region when it comes to automatic triage for directing patients to the right level of care and the right care unit, even in complex flows along the entire patient pathway.
   

  

 Our customers include healthcare regions, private care providers, and insurance companies.

title: Senior Fullstack Developer
description:
**Bli en del av Sveriges snabbast växande techbolag**
 Vi har vuxit från idé till närmare 200 konsulter på bara fyra år – för att vi kombinerar teknisk spets med äkta samarbetskultur. Vi tror på frihet med ansvar, på entreprenörsdriv i vardagen, och på att teknik blir som bäst när människor får utrymme att påverka. Och det fungerar. Förra året blev TechSeed Sveriges snabbast växande konsultbolag – och nu siktar vi på 400 medarbetare nästa år.
   

  

 TechSeed är inte ett vanligt konsultbolag. Vi bygger banbrytande, uppkopplade lösningar från grunden, med teknik som sträcker sig över FPGA, IoT, Edge Computing, Cyber Security, AI och XR. Vi skapar lösningar som inte bara är ligger i teknisk framkant - utan är användardrivna, hållbara och verkligt värdeskapande.
   

  

 Nu söker vi en
 **senior fullstackutvecklare** 
 som vill vara med i ett passionerat och innovativt team. Du har stark kompetens inom både front- och backend, och ett intresse för framtidens teknologier – gärna även XR. Här får du arbeta nära erfarna utvecklare, designers och tekniska projektledare i uppdrag som gör skillnad.
   

  

**Vad du får hos TechSeed**
* Möjlighet att påverka – både projekt, team och TechSeeds framtid
* En inkluderande och lärande kultur där varje perspektiv räknas
* Flexibilitet och självständighet i vardagen
* Bonus- och delägarprogram som låter dig ta del av framgången
* Möjligheten att växa inom områden som matchar dina ambitioner – från teknik till ledarskap


**Vi söker dig som har**
* Gedigen erfarenhet av front-end (React, Angular, HTML/CSS/JS)
* Erfarenhet av back-end-utveckling (Node.js, .NET, Python)
* Kunskap om databaser (MySQL, MongoDB, SQL Server)
* Van att jobba med molntjänster (AWS, Azure, GCP)
* Analytisk förmåga och driv att lösa komplexa problem
* Flytande svenska och engelska
* Bonus: erfarenhet av XR (Unity, Unreal), samt konsultroll eller scale-up-miljö


**Vill du vara med på vår resa och skapa framtidens uppkopplade lösningar tillsammans med oss?** 
 Eller kanske bara nyfiken på att veta mer? Hör av dig redan idag – vi ser fram emot att prata med dig!

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
For those committed to fostering a more resilient Europe and contributing positively to our planet, Fever presents an unparalleled opportunity. Distinguished in the industry for its innovative approach, our company is at the forefront of revolutionising energy.
   

  

 With current funding of $10 million as of February 2024, Fever is listed as one of Europe’s Hottest startups for this year and part of the Swedish Climate Start Map, Fever will enable the consumption and distribution of renewable energy to be unlimited.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Help build a platform that makes the grid intelligent
* Drive projects and exploratory work, often leading initiatives and guiding other engineers along the way
* Uncover, research, and create solutions for a Greenfield product
* Shape and build everything from scratch, turning your hand to multiple technical solutions
* Contribute to the business growth and culture
* Bring new ideas, speak transparently, and bring intelligence to a complex industry


**Our Tech Stack**
* Golang for backend
* Currently using AWS for backend and IoT


**Who You Are**
* Strong Computer Science fundamentals
* Successful experience on creating and maintaining Golang services in production environment
* Curious – constantly learning, ready to research and jump into something new; curiosity drives us to find and solve problems
* Passion to break new ground, be challenged, and push your boundaries in learning a new industry
* Experienced, or driven enough, to self-sufficiently uncover, explore, and build solutions end-to-end—aligning with business goals and supporting teammates as they develop and perform their tasks
* Comfortable digging into partner documentation to discover opportunities to integrate or improve our own APIs, creating new capabilities
* Enjoys bouncing ideas with business and product teams to shape the best path forward
* Strong sense of ownership for their work and impact across the company; can work independently and involve others when needed
* Honest and open: speaks up when something is right or wrong, gives and accepts feedback
* Willing and able to be in our very cool Stockholm office
* Interesting and fun to be around; a nice to have for some, a must have for us


**What We Offer**
* An opportunity to witness the success of a groundbreaking product from its early stages.
* An experienced team who have some great (and terrible) humour!
* Equity - QESO stock options
* Competitive market salary
* Pension
* Maternity and Paternity leave
* Health Insurance

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
**Who we are?**
 We Dibbers are passionate travel enthusiasts who want to make travel planning as easy as possible – a few clicks and you are ready to go! We have built a Swedish cutting-edge online platform to streamline and digitalize the travel experience for companies, individual travelers and wanderlust groups. We are an innovative team who moves the limits and who loves to celebrate success!
   

  

 We are thrilled to announce an exciting opportunity for a talented
 **Senior Backend Developer** 
 to join our team! Our passion for travel is what drives us, and we are looking for someone who shares that same enthusiasm. As our new
 ******Senior Backend Developer******
 based in Stockholm, you will play a key role in architecting and developing our all-in-one platform. If you’re ready to join us on our quest to create a state-of-the-art platform and help people explore the world, let’s connect and discuss how you can make a difference.
   

  

**What do we need?**
* You possess an exceptional knowledge of Java (Functional Java, Java Stream), Spring Boot, Microservices, CI/CD, PostgreSQL, and MySQL, with a preferred minimum of 5+ years of experience in these areas.
* Accountable, reliable, and able to hit the ground running with an enthusiastic and motivated attitude.
* Bonus points if you have experience with Maven, Mongo, AWS, event-driven architecture and developing Rest APIs.
* You should have a good understanding of the full development lifecycle and the Agile Software Development Life Cycle, with exposure to Scrum projects.
* Familiarity with Continuous Integration is a plus.
* Proficiency in object-oriented programming and software engineering principles is essential.
* Open-minded, analytical, and able to problem-solve creatively, in other words, a real-time player.
* Fluency in English (oral and written) is a must, with knowledge of other languages being an advantage.


**What you’ll do:**
* Develop and maintain a high-quality code that adheres to coding standards, conventions and approved designs.
* Investigate and evaluate new and emerging technologies to maximize development efficiency and productivity.
* Co-architect the eco-system around the platform together with your teammates
* Collaborate with product managers, quality assurance representatives, and other developers to accurately estimate system issue resolution or package implementation efforts.
* Deploy and release new features and functionality in a timely manner.
* Create technical design specifications, participate in design reviews, and provide input to design recommendations.
* Conduct unit and integration testing of applications and troubleshoot and resolve any code-related issues or bugs.
* Write comprehensive code comments and debug code to ensure the highest quality of code.
* Ensure compliance with team or project processes and procedures.


**What’s awesome about working at DIB?**
* Be part of a rapidly growing company with the opportunity to influence the development of our platform;
* Hybrid working policy.
* A nice and social office in a great central location.
* We prioritize your growth and development, offering training and education opportunities.
* It is not our goal to box you in, on the contrary, it is to allow you to grow and self-improve through our performance management process. We have a well-organized career path, according to your professional ambition within our company.

title: Senior Game Developer
description:
**Do you want to be part of a company where the player experience comes first to everyone?**
 As a Client Developer at Snowprint Studios, you’ll join an experienced, cross-disciplinary team crafting engaging free-to-play mobile strategy games enjoyed by millions of players worldwide. From
 *Legends of Solgard* 
 and
 *Legend of Rivergard* 
 to
 *Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus* 
 , we’ve always believed that
 **the player experience comes first** 
 , and you’ll play a key role in carrying that forward.
   

  

 At Snowprint, you won’t just implement features. We ask why before we ask how, and we trust each other to take ownership of our craft. In our agile and supportive teams, your ideas will move quickly from code to players’ hands, shaping experiences that truly matter.
   

  

****What you’ll be doing****
 You’ll be deeply involved in building and refining game features, user interfaces, and systems in Unity with C#. Your work will span game logic, graphics, client-server communication and more. Collaboration is at the heart of what we do, so you’ll work closely with designers, artists, and fellow developers to transform concepts into reality.
   

  

 You’ll take responsibility for the technical areas you work on, ensuring your code is scalable, maintainable, and built with care. Whatever the task, from creating new features to solving complex technical challenges, your guiding principle will always be to deliver the best possible
 **player experience** 
 .
   

  

 Is this you?
   

  

 You are an experienced game developer who has ideally worked with live services. You’re familiar with Unity and C#, but might have worked with other engines as well.
   

  

 You enjoy diving into complex systems and writing clean, maintainable, and scalable code, and you have solid knowledge of common 3D engines and their underlying architecture.
   

  

 You speak English at a professional level and are a good communicator
   

  

**Where you’ll work**
 Our Stockholm studio is in Södermalm, with a hybrid working model. We work from the office Tuesdays and Fridays, to allow for closer collaboration and socializing, other days it's up to everyone where they feel most comfortable to work. We support hybrid work with the right setup and tools.
   

  

**About Snowprint Studios**
 Snowprint Studios believes great games are created by teams of talented, kind and creative individuals in a friendly, supportive and inspiring environment - while maintaining a sustainable life-work balance.
   

  

 For more information on Snowprint Studios go to snowprintstudios.com and follow us on Facebook and Twitter.
   

  

 At Snowprint Studios, we embrace diversity both in the worlds we create and in our workplace. Join us in shaping the future of gaming!
   

  

* Pocket Awards 2022 winner ‘mobile game of the year’ and ‘best strategy game’
* Pocket Awards Finalist 2023 'best game we are still playing’ and 'best developer'

title: Senior Backend Engineer – Platform & API Team
description:
**Location:** 
 Stockholm (In-office)
   

  

**Company:** 
 360Player
   

  

**Job Type:** 
 Full-time
   

  

**Join the Global Leader in Sports Technology**
 At 360Player, we are redefining how sports clubs operate, develop players, and manage teams. As the world’s leading all-in-one Club Operating System, we help clubs streamline every aspect of their operations—from scheduling and payments to player development and video analytics. Trusted by top clubs such as Rush Soccer, FC Barcelona, and Rafa Nadal Academy, our platform is transforming the sports world. With offices in Stockholm, Barcelona, and the US, we’re looking for passionate, driven individuals to join our team as we continue to grow globally.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a
 **Senior Backend Engineer** 
 to join our
 **Platform & API team** 
 , focusing on building and maintaining the infrastructure, core systems, and our public API product that will enable scalability and success across all teams and features within 360Player.
   

  

 In this role, you will work on
 **internal tooling, API design, building a world-class public API to open up the 360Player ecosystem, and backend infrastructure** 
 , ensuring stability, performance, and scalability for our growing platform. You will collaborate closely with other backend engineers and cross-functional teams to build the foundations that allow our feature teams to move efficiently and reliably.
   

  

 This role will give you the opportunity to shape technical decisions, mentor team members, and work on challenges related to performance optimization, system design, and scalability as we expand globally and open up our ecosystem for external developers and partners.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Design, build, and maintain core backend services and APIs that support all areas of the 360Player platform, including our public API product.
* Develop internal tools to improve developer workflows, system monitoring, and support the external developer ecosystem.
* Work on database design, optimization, and performance tuning.
* Collaborate with frontend and backend teams to support efficient feature delivery and ensure the API meets the needs of internal and external stakeholders.
* Contribute to architecture discussions to ensure system scalability, stability, and a world-class developer experience.
* Support integrations with third-party systems when required.
* Participate in code reviews and provide mentorship to other developers.
* Identify opportunities for technical improvements and drive initiatives to implement them, aligning with the goal of building a world-class public API that opens up the 360Player ecosystem.


**What We’re Looking For**
* 5+ years of experience in backend development.
* Proficiency in Go (Golang) or strong experience in another language with the willingness to work in Go.
* Strong understanding of relational databases and SQL performance optimization.
* Experience with API design and building robust backend systems.
* Familiarity with Docker, Git, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud services (preferably Azure).
* Solid understanding of system performance, scalability, and clean code practices.
* Comfortable collaborating with engineers and stakeholders across teams.
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work proactively.
* Fluent in English, both spoken and written.


**Personal Qualities**
* Proactive and structured with a high sense of ownership.
* Strong collaboration and communication skills.
* Curious and committed to continuous learning and improvement.
* Enjoys mentoring others and sharing knowledge.
* Motivated by building systems that support others and scale effectively.


**Why 360Player?**
* Be part of a platform trusted by top sports clubs globally.
* Opportunity to shape and build the technical foundation of a fast-growing company.
* Collaborate with a skilled, supportive, and international team.
* Work on projects that have a direct impact on athletes, coaches, and sports organizations.
* Enjoy a flexible, creative, and collaborative work environment where your input truly matters.


**How To Apply**
 If you are excited about backend infrastructure, building scalable systems, and creating impactful tools that empower feature teams, we would love to hear from you.
   

  

 Apply with your
 **resume and a short cover letter** 
 explaining why you are interested in this role at 360Player. We review applications on a rolling basis, so don’t wait to apply! Please note that due to summer vacations interviews will be conducted in August and responses may be delayed.

title: Mobile App Platform Engineer - React Native
description:
*Nordnet redefined the financial world as the first digital bank in Europe. Now we are about to do it again and the aim is to create the next generation of banks, in the cloud. We know that this requires great people, great teams, and great technology. Do you want to join us and build the new Nordnet?* 




  





**In brief** 




  





 At Nordnet we want to democratize savings and investments by giving our customers access to the best tools and information whether you are a professional investor or a small saver. With modern technologies and speed of delivery we are building the next generation investment platform.
 



  





**This is part of the role** 




  





 Nordnet is a company with tech as the primary focus. In our agile and autonomous teams, you will be working with engaged colleagues that love to share their knowledge. As a developer at Nordnet you will have the possibility to make an impact and create value to our customers with continuous releases several times a week.
 



  





**This is you** 




  





 To thrive in this role, we believe that you love to contribute to a state-of-the-art developer experience and to work on improving and modernizing our mobile technology stack. You can easily connect with people, have a solution-oriented mindset and are happy to help and support others.
 



  





**As a Mobile App Platform Engineer, You** 




  




* Are confident in mobile development. Our tech stack includes JavaScript/TypeScript, React Native, Redux, RTK Query, Testing library, MSW, React Navigation, GitHub actions and Expo
* Have a birds eye perspective when setting the architecture for the future
* Are motivated when faced with complex technical problems
* Are eager to automate things



  





**A Bonus Is If You** 




  




* Are knowledgeable in Java and Terraform
* Are interested or have experience with the rest of the tech stack, which includes GCP, Nginx, Docker, Kubernetes and ArgoCD



  





**Nordnetters** 




  




* Are proud of the friendly and humble environment
* Believe that the best code is written together and therefore appreciate pair/mob programming
* Continuously improving to ensure quality, making the code better with every release
* Commit to our goals as a team, sharing the responsibility, success and failure



  





**What We Offer** 




  




* Experienced team which build own products and support other teams and products
* Your expertise and contribution will be appreciated from day one
* Plenty of opportunities to grow as an engineer
* Competitive salary and compensation
* Flexible work setup (from office or hybrid)



  





 We offer you the opportunity to work in a Nordic environment with a strong focus on delivery, product development and technology. Our ambitions are high and you will embark on a fast and challenging journey together with a skillful team of sharp and committed colleagues. We are embracing the agile way of working.
 



  





 Culture is built and cared for, each day by everyone. We’re proud of ours. Having a flat organization where anyone can talk to anyone creates a warm and friendly atmosphere worth protecting. We believe in a culture where every effort counts and where everyone is being recognized. A culture embracing our core values – passion, simplicity and transparency on all levels, no matter who you are or what you do.
 



  





 We are over 900 employees in Stockholm, Oslo, Helsinki and Copenhagen. Visit us on:
 **www.nordnetab.com** 




  





**Questions & applications** 




  





 Apply today – we will start interviewing immediately. Please note that we do only accept applications through our recruitment system, hence no email applications will be considered. We want to inform you that Nordnet conducts mandatory credit and background checks, as well as drug testing as a part of our recruitment process.
 



  





 We look forward to receiving your application!

title: SAP ABAP Developer
description:
Pearl Fintech offers IT services and solutions for the banking and financial sector, where our greatest asset is our knowledgeable and dedicated employees. Our solutions, based on standard SAP products and experience from client projects, are designed to meet the specific requirements and regulations within the financial industry.
   

  

 To succeed, we need to grow and are now looking for an experienced SAP ABAP developer with an interest in banking and finance. Pearl Fintech is at the forefront technologically, and you will have the opportunity to work with the latest technologies in the field.
   

  

 Pearl Fintech has a hybrid workplace and encourages employees to want to come into the office. You will be based at our new, modern office in central Stockholm and report to the Team Leader of the SAP Development Team.
   

  

 Responsibility
   

  

 Your responsibilities include developing and maintaining future system solutions for the banking and financial market.
   

  

 Your main tasks will be to design and develop clean, maintainable code as well as to develop Fiori/UI5 applications for FLP using RAP.
   

  

 Other common responsibilities include:
   

  

* Test automation
* Integration
* Writing technical documentation
* Mentorship for less experienced colleagues


 Is this you?
   

  

 To be successful in this role, we believe you have:
   

  

* An academic degree in IT, Computer Science, or a related field
* At least 5 years of professional software development experience (SAP ABAP)
* Experience in object-oriented development


 You speak and write English fluently.
   

  

 It is considered a merit if you have experience with S/4 HANA, ADT, the banking and financial industry, SAP PI/PO or alternatively SAP Integration Suite. Furthermore, it is advantageous if you have experience with agile methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban, version control systems such as Git, gCTS, TDD, AI, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning.
   

  

**Personal qualities**
 We place great emphasis on personal qualities and are looking for a communicative, solution-oriented developer with a strong interest in both technology and business processes. You stay up to date with the latest trends and methods. Your ability to document is very strong. Furthermore, you have good collaboration skills and are a team player with a positive attitude. You are driven and committed to delivering high-quality results. In addition, you are humble and unpretentious.
   

  

**How to apply?**
 In this recruitment, Pearl Fintech is collaborating with Level Recruitment and all questions regarding the application process can be directed to Level Recruitment directly. You will get directed to their application form by clicking the "Apply for this job" button.
   

  

 We hope to hear from you soon!

title: Animator
description:
Do you love bringing characters to life?
   

  

 You see every movement as a chance to add emotion, style, and gameplay clarity. You know the difference between something that moves, and something that moves you.
   

  

 As an Animator at Snowprint Studios, you’ll help define the personality of our games. From expressive heroes to strange, multi-legged creatures, you’ll create animations that feel great, look sharp, and make gameplay better. You’ll work on
 *Tacticus* 
 , our award-winning strategy game, and collaborate closely with artists, designers, and developers across disciplines.
   

  

 We’re a small, experienced team that values kindness, creativity, and self-leadership. We move fast, give feedback generously, and trust people to own their craft. You’ll have room to push ideas, test quickly, and ship animations that players around the world will love.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
 First of all, animation, of course. But you also adjust 3D models and perhaps even build them, rig them, animate them and implement them. It’s varied work. You’ll animate characters, props, UI and more, crafting fluid, responsive animations that elevate gameplay and fit seamlessly into the game experience.
   

  

 You’ll work in Maya and bring your experience with FK/IK animation, rigging, and mesh adaptation to support the needs of the project. You’ll also work with Unity3D, using both realtime and baked physics, cloth simulation, and dynamic forces to enhance fidelity and feel.
   

  

 You’ll be part of a collaborative team, working closely with Art Directors and cross-discipline stakeholders to problem-solve and improve the pipeline. Your insights will help shape how animation supports storytelling, gameplay, and the overall player experience.
   

  

**Is this you?**
 You’ve spent a few years animating for games and know how to balance creativity with technical constraints. You bring strong fundamentals and a passion for gameplay-first animation.
   

  

 You know your way around Maya and game engines (we use Unity3D) and have a solid grasp of game art pipelines. You’re comfortable adapting meshes and tweaking models for animation needs, and you’ve worked with real time and baked physics, including cloth, rigid body, and soft body dynamics.
   

  

 You’re a strong communicator who thrives in a collaborative environment, always ready to give and receive feedback. You stay curious, open-minded, and eager to explore new tools, techniques, or style-switching between cartoony and realistic as needed. A deep passion for games and a belief in the power of team-driven development drives everything you do
   

  

**Where you’ll work**
 Our Stockholm studio is in Södermalm and our Berlin studio is in Mitte, with a hybrid working model. We work from the office Tuesdays and Fridays, to allow for closer collaboration and socializing, other days it's up to everyone where they feel most comfortable to work. We support hybrid work by supplying you with the right setup and tools.
   

  

**About Snowprint Studios**
 Snowprint Studios believes great games are created by teams of talented, kind and creative individuals in a friendly, supportive and inspiring environment - while maintaining a sustainable life-work balance.
   

  

 For more information on Snowprint Studios go to snowprintstudios.com and follow us on Facebook and Twitter.
   

  

 At Snowprint Studios, we embrace diversity both in the worlds we create and in our workplace. Join us in shaping the future of gaming!
   

  

* Pocket Gamer Awards 2022 winner ‘mobile game of the year’ and ‘best strategy game’
* Pocket Gamer Awards 2024 winner 'best game we are still playing’ and finalist 'best developer'

title: AI-utvecklare med arkitekttänk
description:
Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

* Vara en nyckelperson i utvecklingen av våra AI-lösningar – från kod till arkitektur
* Bygga lösningar i AWS-miljö men också intilliggande on-prem lösningar byggda i Java / Typescript / Python
* Bidra till vägval kring arkitektur, skalbarhet och kvalitet


 Att jobba som AI-utvecklare
   

  

 Vi står mitt i ett spännande teknikskifte där AI spelar en avgörande roll i hur vi bygger framtidens digitala tjänster. Nu behöver vi stärka teamet med en erfaren utvecklare med arkitekttänk som tidigare byggt, produktionssatt och förvaltat AI-lösningar. Här får du vara med och föra ett av våra viktigaste AI-initiativ framåt och vara med på en resa i vårt skapande av en AI-assistent byggd på information från SBAB och även Booli för att skapa en helt unik tjänst.
   

  

 Vad du kommer göra:
   

  

* Vara en nyckelperson i utvecklingen av våra AI-lösningar – från kod till arkitektur.
* Arbeta med generativa modeller, prompt engineering, integrationer, vektordatabaser och utvärderingsmetoder.
* Bygga lösningar i AWS-miljö (exempelvis med Bedrock och andra tjänster) men också intilliggande on-prem lösningar byggda i Java / Typescript / Python.
* Bidra till vägval kring arkitektur, skalbarhet och kvalitet.
* Jobba nära andra utvecklare, produktägare och specialister i ett tvärfunktionellt team.


 Vi tror att du har flera års erfarenhet som utvecklare (Python) och varit med på en liknande AI-resa i en större organisation. Vidare har du god erfarenhet av att bygga och drifta lösningar i AWS eller liknande. Du har också en ödmjuk inställning till det ansvar som kommer med att jobba med AI och personuppgifter.
   

  

 Hos oss får du möjlighet att vara med och bygga ett prioriterat initiativ som ständigt utvecklas. Du får ta ansvar och påverka tekniken, strukturen och den fortsatta riktningen framåt. Du kommer att arbeta tillsammans med ett kunnigt, nyfiket och prestigelöst team där din kompetens blir ett värdefullt komplement. Vi erbjuder en miljö som förenar innovationslust med respekt för regler och riktlinjer, samt flexibla arbetssätt och en kultur som värdesätter balans, lärande och framdrift.
   

  

 Har du check på allt?
   

  

* Kommunikativ
* Kvalitetsmedveten
* Lagspelare
* Nyfiken
* Prestigelös


 Annars då?

title: Utvecklare Dynamics 365 F&O
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**Om rollen:** 




 I rollen som utvecklare inom Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations kommer du att ansvara för att utveckla och integrera affärslösningar för våra kunder inom olika branscher. Du kommer att arbeta med att anpassa systemet efter kundernas specifika behov och integrera Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations med andra system för att säkerställa smidiga affärsflöden.
 



  





**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter kommer att inkludera:** 



* Utveckling och anpassning av funktionalitet i Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations med hjälp av X++ och C#.
* Skapande och hantering av integrationer med hjälp av Azure Integration Services för att koppla Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations med externa system.
* Design och implementering av integrationer via REST API för att möjliggöra sömlös kommunikation mellan olika plattformar och system.
* Delta i förstudier och workshops för att förstå kundens behov och krav samt bidra till lösningsdesign.
* Testning och validering av utvecklade lösningar för att säkerställa att de möter både funktionella och tekniska krav.



  





**Vi söker dig som:** 



* Har minst 3 års erfarenhet som utvecklare inom Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations.
* Har goda kunskaper i X++, C# och Azure Integration Services.
* Har tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta med integrationer mellan Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations och andra system via REST API.
* Har ett starkt intresse för att arbeta med tekniska lösningar som stödjer affärsprocesser och vill bidra med din expertis till innovativa projekt.

title: Senior Software Engineer, AI/ML
description:
Artificial intelligence is changing society. AI Sweden is the national center for applied artificial intelligence, jointly funded by the Swedish government and our partners, both public and private. Our mission is to accelerate the use of AI for the benefit of society, our competitiveness and everyone living in Sweden.
   

  

 Do you want to play a key role in how Sweden uses artificial intelligence to build a better society? AI Sweden is Sweden's national center for applied AI, funded by the state and our partners in the public and private sectors.
   

  

**About The Position**
 AI Sweden is a key partner of the OpenEuroLLM project that will build an open European family of Large Language Models (LLMs) to be published with underlying training sources in an open way.
   

  

 In the role as a Senior Software Engineer, AI/ML you will be involved in the whole process of building LLMs, including making sure that they comply with regulatory requirements. You will also be responsible for leading the knowledge transfer to our partners.
   

  

 You will work in Sweden’s leading research group on LLMs, the Natural Language Understanding (NLU) group at AI Sweden. Our team is at the forefront of developing and training foundational models, and you will encounter a range of stimulating technical challenges and develop some of the most sought-after technical skills in the industry. You’ll be working in a highly stimulating environment where your creativity and power of initiative is not just welcomed, but essential. This position is perfect for those who want to use their proven deep expertise in system development to architect cutting-edge practices and drive AI productivity in a broader context.
   

  

 We aim to fill the position as soon as possible.
   

  

**We believe that as a person you are**
 Inquisitive Learner: Passionate about AI and machine learning, you are driven by a desire to continually learn and stay on top of the latest developments.
   

  

 Practical Problem Solver: With a talent for innovative solutions, you see past challenges and focus on constructive outcomes. Your approach combines practicality with creativity.
   

  

 Effective Communicator: Your ability to convey complex ideas clearly is important. We highly value a knowledge-sharing culture within our diverse team and to the wider community.
   

  

**And workwise, you are**
 Experienced System Engineer: You are a skilled system engineer with a proven track record at the intersection of system development, CI/CD and data engineering. You possess deep expertise in designing, securing, and operating resilient infrastructure across both cloud and on-premises environments.
   

  

 Strong Programmer: You have excellent and proven programming skills in Python and preferably also C and C++.
   

  

 Practical Deep Learner: You have previous experience working with deep learning frameworks such as PyTorch. HPC experience is a plus.
   

  

 Agile Technical Mentor: You are strategically skilled in evaluating and recommending open-source solutions while quickly mastering new machine learning trends. Furthermore, you are passionate about driving organizational growth by fostering a culture of continuous learning through dedicated mentorship and coaching.
   

  

**Requirements**
**Educational Background:** 
 A degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or related fields. While advanced degrees are advantageous, they are not a necessity for candidates with substantial relevant experience.
   

  

**Professional Experience:** 
 You have at least 5 years of proven experience as a Senior Software Engineer or in an equivalent role, complemented by at least 2 years of hands-on experience developing machine learning solutions, particularly with LLMs. You have worked in the public sector and work experience in the defense sector is a plus.
   

  

**Technical Expertise** 
 : Proficient in programming languages prevalent in AI, particularly Python, and familiar with frameworks like Pytorch and Tensorflow.
   

  

**Swedish citizenship:** 
 In this position we are looking for applicants with Swedish citizenship.
   

  

**Application deadline:** 
 30th September 2025. We will begin and process all applications before the deadline. This means that the role could be filled before the end of application deadline. So if you are interested, do not hesitate to apply.
   

  

**Why work for AI Sweden?**
 For us, artificial intelligence is not just about technology, it is a force for positive social change. You will work alongside leading AI experts, researchers, journalists, linguists, policy experts, entrepreneurs, change leaders and many more. To work here you don't need to know "everything" about AI, but you do need to believe in its potential to shape our society for the better.
   

  

 As an organization, we are uniquely positioned at the intersection of government influence and startup agility. We are small enough to be adaptable and fun, but we have close contact with both business, academia, and the private and public sectors.
   

  

 With us, you make a real difference by contributing to initiatives that benefit society and address critical challenges. Be at the forefront of AI innovation, work with the latest technology, and play a key role in shaping the future of AI in Sweden.
   

  

 In short, we believe in offering our team members a place to grow and an environment for personal development.
   

  

**An equal and fair work environment**
 We strongly believe in diversity and inclusion and actively strive to put together a diverse team in terms of age, gender, and background. We have collective agreements and offer everything that comes with this, such as pensions, wellness benefits, and more.
   

  

 AI Sweden has chosen not to collaborate with external parties for this recruitment and please do not be contacted by any advertising agencies, recruitment agencies or staffing companies.

title: Senior System Developer - HPI
description:
**Vill du vara med och göra skillnad i hälsoteknikens framkant? Bli en del av vårt engagerade team och bidra till bättre hälsa och hållbara arbetsliv!**
**Om oss – Ett innovativt hälsoteknikföretag**
 Vi på HPI är ett växande hälsoteknikföretag som kombinerar IT-utveckling, metodutveckling, dataanalys och forskning för att leverera den ledande digitala plattformen inom hälso- och arbetsmiljöutveckling i Norden.
   

  

 Genom vår plattform Plustoo erbjuder vi tjänster och expertkunskap till företagshälsor, gym- och träningsanläggningar samt andra hälsoaktörer. Tillsammans hjälper vi individer och arbetsgivare att främja hälsa och skapa hållbara arbetsliv. Vi bedriver uppmärksammad forskning i samarbete med bland annat Gymnastik- och idrottshögskolan (GIH) och har verkat i snart 50 år. Trots att vi är ett mindre företag har vi stor påverkan genom vår plattform och vår världsunika databas med över tre decenniers insamlade data. Just nu befinner vi oss i en spännande expansionsfas både i Sverige och Norge.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som systemutvecklare hos oss kommer du att arbeta med utveckling av våra plattformar Plustoo och Todaytoo.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som trivs i en teamorienterad miljö och vill bidra aktivt till att nå gemensamma mål. Vårt utvecklingsarbete är agilt och starkt präglat av samarbete, så vi ser gärna att du är en lagspelare som gillar att dela idéer och lösningar.
   

  

 Eftersom vi hanterar känsliga personuppgifter ställer vi höga krav på kvalitet och säkerhet i allt vi gör. Du kommer att arbeta nära vårt engagerade team som inkluderar frontend- och backend-utvecklare, produktägare och utvecklingschef. Dessutom får du möjlighet att samarbeta med våra specialister inom hälsa och arbetsmiljö, vilket ger dig insikt i hur teknik kan förbättra hälsa och skapa hållbara arbetsliv.
   

  

**Vi ser gärna att du har:**
* Flera års erfarenhet av C# .NET
* Goda kunskaper i Entity Framework och MSSQL
* Erfarenhet av ASP.Net Core web API
* Erfarenhet av att jobba med integrationer mot externa system
* Flytande svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


**Det är ett plus om du har:**
* Erfarenhet av systemarkitektur och/eller ledarskap inom utvecklingsteam
* Praktisk erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines (TeamCity/Octopus eller liknande) och kodsignering
* Arbetat med loggning och centraliserad loggning (SEQ eller liknande)
* Erfarenhet av applikationsutveckling för Windows med WinForms och ClickOnce
* Erfarenhet av att konfigurera brandväggar och DNS-inställningar
* Jobbat med Internet Information Services (IIS) och hanterat servercertifikat


**Övrig teknik vi ser som ett plus:**
* Git, JIRA och Confluence
* Azure-tjänster såsom Key Vault, SignalR, SSO med SAML
* NoSQL: Redis, ElasticSearch
* BankID
* Digital signering av PDF


**Vad vi erbjuder**
 Vi drivs av en vision om ett samhälle där människor upplever god hälsa och har ett hållbart arbetsliv. Vi tror starkt på att arbetsplatsen är en idealisk arena för hälsofrämjande insatser.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder bland annat:
   

  

* Träning på arbetstid och friskvårdsbidrag
* Konkurrenskraftiga anställningsvillkor
* Sex veckors semester
* Tjänstepension (ITP1)
* Sjukvårdsförsäkring


 Vi värnar om balansen mellan arbete och fritid, med flexibel arbetstid och möjlighet till hybridarbete. Även om vi uppmuntrar samarbete på vårt kontor på centrala Södermalm i Stockholm, finns också möjlighet till distansarbete.
   

  

 Vårt rymliga kontor delas med systerbolag inom Health- och Medtech-sektorn som ingår i vår koncern Carasent, vilket skapar spännande möjligheter till samarbeten.
   

  

**Om Carasent**
 Bolagen i Carasent-koncernen utvecklar och levererar ett ekosystem av integrerade SaaS-tjänster inom olika typer av vård. Genom en bred portfölj av IT-system och applikationer – från molnbaserade journalsystem och verktyg för digital patientkommunikation till BI-lösningar och partnerintegrationer – erbjuder Carasent den mest flexibla lösningen för vårdgivare på den nordiska marknaden idag.
   

  

 Carasent har idag drygt 150 anställda i Sverige och Norge och är listat på Oslo Börs. Våra kunder återfinns inom primärvård, specialistvård, företagshälsovård och rehabilitering, främst inom privat sektor. Huvudkontoret ligger i Göteborg.
   

  

 Företag inom koncernen: Carasent Sverige, Metodika AB, Carasent NO, Medrave Software AB och vi på HPI Health Profile Institute AB.
   

  

 Innan anställning genomför vi en bakgrundskontroll via SRI.
   

  

 Känner du igen dig i beskrivningen ovan? Varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag! Vi går igenom urvalet löpande och tjänsten tillsätts så snart vi hittat rätt person.
   

  

 Vid frågor om rollen, kontakta gärna
 **zoe.lepluart@ninox-limited.com** 
 .

 Expert FPGA developer med minst 10 års erfarenhet.
   

  

 Personen ska snabbt kunna sätta sig in i VHLD-kod och kunna förstå problematiken, kunna ansvara för egen utveckling i ett team samt kunna arbeta självständigt med både VHDL-utveckling, test bänkar samt i ett labb med verifiering.
