With the insights you gather, and in close dialogue with our product development team, you’ll also have the opportunity to influence the development of the product going forward.
   

  

 As part of the team, it’s mainly your passion, self-leadership and motivation that influence your development. You’ll gradually gain in-depth knowledge of our platform and data-driven financial management. You’ll also have great opportunities to grow alongside the company on its exciting growth-journey.
   

  

**You're**
* A problem solver
* A team player with good self-leadership skills
* Structured and thorough with a business mindset
* Communicative


**Background/Skills**
* Degree in Engineering, Information Technology, Business, or a related field
* Ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quickly
* Fluent in written and spoken English & Swedish


**We offer a flexible work environment and good employment conditions**
 At Planacy, all employees play a key role and have a significant impact on the product and the company’s development. We have a passion for what we do. We have fun together and celebrate our success with shuffleboard, bubbles, burgers and a well-stocked beer fridge – as well as with a week-long annual Take Off to a pleasant destination (usually in southern Europe).
   

  

 We are convinced that if the team - that makes our success possible - continuously evolves and are happy and healthy, the success will be all the greater. We therefore offer a high level of trust and we value commitment and a high level of responsibility.
   

  

**We also offer:**
* Flexible work environment 🕐
* Both fixed and variable salary 💰
* 6 weeks of vacation 🏄🏻‍♀️
* A very good retirement plan 👵🏼
* Comprehensive health insurance 💙
* Annually one week team Take Off 🏖 🕺
* + additional benefits


 The role is based at our brand new office in central Stockholm but we offer a lot of freedom under responsibility.
   

  

 Of course you should join Team Planacy's continued growth-journey as our next Solution Specialist!

title: Microsoft 365-konsult
description:
Vill du arbeta nära verksamheten och skapa lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad i människors vardag? Vi söker en Microsoft 365-konsult som brinner för att utveckla digitala arbetssätt och som vill vara med och driva användningen av SharePoint, Teams och Viva framåt.
   

  

 Här får du en central roll i att förstå behov, leda workshops och omvandla insikter till smarta, hållbara lösningar som gör arbetet enklare, mer effektivt och mer engagerande.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

* Leda workshops och dialoger med verksamheten för att identifiera behov och förbättringsområden.
* Designa och implementera lösningar i SharePoint, Teams och Viva utifrån verksamhetens processer och mål.
* Skapa och konfigurera Teams-mallar, dashboards i Viva samt startsidor för produktions- och samarbetsytor.
* Kommunicera tekniska lösningar på ett pedagogiskt sätt till olika målgrupper.
* Säkerställa rätt behörighetsstrukturer, hantera MFA och arbeta med dynamiska grupper.
* Kvalitetssäkra lösningar och säkerställa smidig överlämning till drift och förvaltning.
* Dokumentera arbetssätt, lösningar och processer på ett strukturerat sätt.
* Fungera som brygga mellan IT och verksamhet i nära samarbete med kollegor och intressenter.


 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* Djup kunskap om Microsoft 365, särskilt SharePoint, Teams och Viva.
* Vana att arbeta i adminportaler och konfigurera inställningar såsom behörigheter, MFA och grupper.
* Erfarenhet av att skapa strukturer och mallar i Teams samt integrera nyhetsflöden och dashboards.
* Förmåga att leda workshops och samla in verksamhetskrav på ett strukturerat sätt.
* God kommunikationsförmåga, både muntligt och skriftligt, samt förmåga att visualisera lösningar.
* Erfarenhet av att dokumentera lösningar och arbeta med test och kvalitetssäkring.
* En lagspelare som främjar samarbete och delar kunskap.


 Meriterande
   

  

* Erfarenhet av förändringsledning och införande av Microsoft 365-lösningar för både administrativ och operativ personal.
* Erfarenhet av agilt arbetssätt och tvärfunktionella team.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska.


**Start** 
 : Omgående start med hänsyn till uppsägningstid. Uppdraget är på heltid och är tillsvidare
   

  

**Placeringsort:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Ansökan:** 
 Intervjuer sker löpande och tillsättning sker vid rätt match
   

  

**Vad vi står för:**
 Vi på Camai erbjuder ett av marknadens branschledande anställningsvillkor med stor frihet som ledord. Vi drivs av att hitta det bästa uppdraget för våra medarbetare. Det roligaste som finns är att hitta en perfekt matchning mellan konsult och kund. Vi vet att alla har ett drömarbete, och vi är ett tight entreprenörsdrivet team som arbetar för att se till att du tycker att det är roligt att gå till jobbet, varje dag. Vi tror att kompetenta människor dras till varandra och vill jobba med likasinnade i spännande kunduppdrag.
   

  

 Vi har en av marknadens mest förmånliga ersättningsmodell anpassad för en modern konsultorganisation med mycket frihet. Vi har helt enkelt kul tillsammans!
   

  

**Varför ska du välja oss?**
 Med många års erfarenhet i konsultbranschen har vi valt våra tre värdeord med omsorg; kommunikation, ambition och balans. För att lyckas tror vi att våra medarbetare får vara med och forma sitt arbete efter prioriteringar och intresse i livet. Med din ambition och rätt verktyg från oss ser vi till att du utvecklas och samtidigt belönas på vägen.
   

  

*Hoppas att du vill vara en del av vår fortsatta tillväxt!*

title: AI Solutions Engineer
description:
**About Gilion:**
 Our mission is clear: We are accelerating founders in their growth journey through our Gilion platform. As a growing product company leveraging AI, we are creating an innovative, technically challenging platform revolutionizing how businesses grow - with the key of the platform being analytics, unique AI forecasting and equally as important; access to financing and funding, in a way never done before. Watch our platform here: gilion.com/platform
   

  

 Our team is made up of experts who have been part of leading companies like Spotify, Google, King, Sinch, bringing a wealth of experience and a passion for pushing boundaries. At Gilion, you’ll be part of a fast-moving, dynamic environment where your work will have a tangible impact on both our product and the industry as a whole. If you’re excited about working with challenging technology and making a real difference, Gilion is the place for you.
   

  

**About the Role:**
 You’ll bridge the gap between Gilion’s customers and our AI-driven analytics products. You will be building tools and services that make customers’ data accessible to an Analytics platform and AI agents for advanced credit and business analysis. In this role, you’ll also be spending time engaging directly with customers - onboarding them to our platform, ensuring their data quality, and making sure their integration is smooth and scalable as we grow.
   

  

* Lead customer onboarding from a technical perspective - guiding setup, integration, and data mapping and creating scalable solutions.
* Ensure high-quality, structured customer data that meets analysis requirements.
* Use and develop internal tools to clean, transform, and enrich data
* Collaborate with the product and engineering teams to build and improve data transformation tools and semantic layers.
* Work with AI agent orchestration (e.g. develop MCPs) to ensure agents have the right data and context to perform automated analyses.


**Background/Profile:**
* Strong understanding of data processing and integration
* Experience in backend development for building data transformation scripts/services.
* Strong interest in working with AI
* Excellent communication skills - able to explain technical concepts clearly to non-technical customers.
* Self-driven, adaptable, and eager to work in a fast-paced scaleup environment.


**What we offer:**
* Work-life balance, hybrid-remote model
* Diverse, inclusive and knowledge-sharing culture
* Experienced founders, backed by top investors
* A growth journey with tons of development opportunities
* AI product that impacts how companies grow, disrupting the industry

title: Säljande konsultchef till Liminity!
description:
Vill du ta nästa steg i din karriär som konsultchef och brinner för försäljning, ledarskap och att bygga starka relationer? Nu söker vi på Liminity ytterligare en säljande konsultchef som vill vara med och vidareutveckla både våra konsulters och våra kunders framgång!
   

  

 Ansvarsområden – Sälj och ledarskap i rollen som konsultchef
   

  

* Bygga och utveckla långsiktiga kundrelationer samt identifiera nya affärsmöjligheter
* Ansvara för rekrytering, coachning och utveckling av konsulter inom IT
* Sälja in konsulttjänster till både nya och befintliga kunder
* Matcha konsulter till rätt uppdrag och säkerställa hög trivsel och kvalitet i leveranser


 Vad vi söker hos dig som säljande konsultchef
   

  

* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av försäljning eller konsultledning inom IT eller teknik
* Erfarenhet av relationsbyggande B2B-försäljning och konsultanskaffning
* Gedigen kommunikativ förmåga på svenska och engelska, både muntligt och skriftligt
* Intresse för ledarskap, utveckling av människor och skapa teamkänsla
* Strukturerad, affärsdriven och trivs i högt tempo
* Förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i nya roller, kundbehov och tekniska miljöer


 Meriterande erfarenheter i rollen
   

  

* Erfarenhet av konsultverksamhet inom IT/teknik eller motsvarande
* Bakgrund av rekrytering och/eller bemanning
* Arbetat med affärsutveckling, account management eller kundansvar
* Certifieringar inom ledarskap, försäljning eller coachning
* Befintligt kundnätverk


 Därför ska du jobba som konsultchef på Liminity
   

  

* Spännande och utvecklande affärsmiljö
* Möjlighet att påverka, utmana och forma din egen roll
* Tydliga mål och förväntningar – du är med och påverkar vår tillväxt
* Omfattande utbildningsmöjligheter, coachning och certifieringar
* Konkurrenskraftig lön, bonusmöjligheter och attraktiva förmåner
* Vill du veta mer? Kolla in vår handbok


**Vill du vara med på Liminitys resa?**

title: Customer Success till Get a Newsletter (konsult)
description:
Om oss
   

  

 Get a Newsletter startade med en enkel idé: att göra e-postmarknadsföring enkel för småföretag. Sedan dess har över
 **60 000 företagare** 
 använt plattformen för att växa sina verksamheter med oss.
   

  

 Nu står vi inför nästa stora steg: att skala upp både produkten och teamet – och vi behöver din hjälp för att bygga en Customer Success-funktion som verkligen gör skillnad.
   

  

 Rollen
   

  

 Vi söker en
 **erfaren och resultatorienterad Customer Success-konsult** 
 som kan visa på tydliga resultat från tidigare SaaS-uppdrag.
   

  

 Det här är inte en roll för någon som vill analysera i månader – vi behöver någon som
 **går från tanke till handling snabbt** 
 och skapar resultat direkt.
   

  

 Som konsult hos oss får du:
   

  

* Bygga upp hela Customer Success från grunden – processer, system och playbooks.
* Jobba hands-on med kunderna för att aktivera, behålla och utveckla dem.
* Sätta strukturer som skalar och som kan tas över av ett långsiktigt team.


 Ditt uppdrag
   

  

 Ditt primära mål är att
 **höja Net MRR Retention från 99% → 110%** 
 genom små ständiga förbättringar som genererar resultat snabbt
   

  

 För att lyckas kommer du att:
   

  

* Bygga smarta system som aktiverar fler kunder och driver expansion.
* Köra winback-kampanjer och churn-prevention-flöden.
* Skapa onboardingflöden och case studies som visar värdet av produkten.
* Hjälpa kunder att nå konkreta resultat – vilket leder till högre intäkter för oss.


 Vi söker dig som
   

  

* Har erfarenhet av Customer Success i SaaS och kan visa på resultat.
* Behärskar svenska flytande (de flesta av våra kunder är svenska).
* Älskar att prata med kunder och förstår hur man driver både aktivering och expansion.
* Är både strategisk och hands-on – du kan designa system och själv exekvera.
* Har en bias för action – du testar, mäter, lär och itererar snabbt.


 Varför det här är speciellt
   

  

* Du får bygga upp en hel funktion från grunden.
* Ditt arbete gör omedelbar skillnad – både för våra kunder och vår tillväxt.
* Du blir en nyckelperson i ett litet team med stora ambitioner.
* Du jobbar remote – vi är ett helt distribuerat team.


 Vill du vara med?
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du arbetar med oss i upp till 6 månader – men det viktigaste är att vi ser
 **impact tidigt** 
 . Om du är rätt person kan det också öppna dörrar för en mer långsiktig roll i teamet.
   

  

 Känner du igen dig? Ansök nu och hjälp oss att ta Customer Success på Get a Newsletter till nästa nivå
   

  

 Har du frågor så hör av dig till Martin på martin@getanewsletter.com

title: Cloud Consultant AWS
description:
**Utveckla din karriär inom Public Cloud hos Orange Business!** 




  





 Är du passionerad kring cloud-transformation och redo att driva innovation för Orange Business kunder? Vi befinner oss i en spännande tillväxtfas, med höga ambitioner för vårt Public Cloud Delivery-team, och vi söker en AWS-konsult som vill växa tillsammans med oss.
 



 I den här rollen får du en central del i att forma våra AWS-erbjudanden, leverera innovativa molnlösningar och bidra till utvecklingen av vårt team, våra kompetenser och vår kultur. Det här är din chans att bli en del av en samarbetsinriktad miljö där dina idéer räknas och där du kan göra verklig skillnad för våra kunder, vårt team och framtiden för public cloud på Orange Business.
 



  





  





**Din roll kan innebära:** 




  





 ✅ Designa och implementera skalbara molnlösningar på AWS
 



 ✅ Leda migrationsprojekt och moderniseringsinitiativ
 



 ✅ Bygga styrningsramverk och landing zones enligt AWS best practices
 



 ✅ Delta i pre-sales och kundworkshops
 



 ✅ Översätta affärskrav till säkra och skalbara AWS-arkitekturer
 



  





  





**Vi söker dig som har:** 




  




* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av arkitektur och implementation i Azure
* Erfarenhet av moderna leveransverktyg och ramverk (CI/CD, DevOps, Agile/Scrum, Git)
* Erfarenhet av Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation, AWS CDK)
* Erfarenhet av containerisering med Docker och Amazon EKS (Elastic Kubernetes Service)
* Erfarenhet av AWS serverless och integrationslösningar såsom AWS Lambda, Amazon API Gateway, Step Functions, Amazon SQS/SNS
* God förståelse för AWS Well-Architected Framework
* Flytande kommunikationsförmåga på både svenska och engelska (tal och skrift)



  





  





**För en senior roll tror vi även att du har:** 




  




* Erfarenhet av komplexa migrationsprojekt
* Erfarenhet av att översätta affärskrav till tekniska lösningar
* Kundnära erfarenhet
* Lösningsorienterat mindset med förmåga att tänka kreativt och leverera innovativa lösningar som skapar affärsvärde



  





  





**Vår teamkultur** 




  





 Om du tycker om att arbeta med ny teknik och hålla din kunskap uppdaterad kommer du passa bra hos oss. Vi arbetar i agila team med en no-blame-kultur där vi uppmuntrar innovation och ger våra medarbetare autonomi att fatta beslut. För oss är det viktigt att ständigt förbättras, arbeta proaktivt och automatisera snarare än att repetera uppgifter.
 



 Är du nyfiken på att utvecklas? Vi ser till att våra team alltid ligger steget före genom att ge tid för certifieringar, delta i eller titta på webbinarier, labba självständigt eller helt enkelt diskutera idéer med kollegor.
 



  





  





  





**Varför ska du välja oss?** 




  




* Flexibelt arbetssätt – hybridlösning med modernt och samarbetsinriktat kontor i Stockholm
* Kontinuerliga lärandemöjligheter och certifieringar
* Vi är en människoorienterad organisation och stolta över vår Great Place to Work-certifiering
* En kultur utan skuldbeläggning – du får frihet att innovera
* Möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste molnteknologin
* Ett community av experter – som Digital Natives sätter vi innovation i centrum för vår kompetens
* Läs mer om våra förmåner
 
 här.



  





  





**Om Orange Business:** 




  





 Orange Business är ett ledande nätverks- och digitalintegratörsföretag med kontor i 65 länder världen över och en del av Orange-koncernen.
 



  





 Digital Services, en affärsenhet inom Orange Business, är en nybildad division inom Orange Business. I Europa består affärsområdet av cirka 1500 medarbetare fördelade över 10 länder. Vi är digitala natives med innovation i centrum för vår verksamhet, vilket gör oss till en pålitlig partner nära våra kunder. Vårt gemensamma uppdrag är att hjälpa dem att förnya, driva och leda sin digitala transformation och sina affärsstrategier inom viktiga digitala områden, inklusive Cloud, Customer Experience, Digital Workspace samt Data & AI. Som en agil och snabbfotad digital affärspartner erbjuder affärsenheten pålitliga end-to-end-lösningar och produkter som hjälper företag i en rad olika branscher, både inom privat och offentlig sektor, att transformera sin verksamhet, förbättra kundupplevelsen och driva tillväxt.
 



  





 Med vår digitala expertis är vi en strategisk partner till Orange Business mål att vara en ledande nätverks- och digitalintegratör, med vårt team som en viktig tillväxtmotor.
 



  





  





**Rekryteringsprocessen:** 




  





 Vi går igenom ansökningar löpande och strävar efter att hålla intervjuer och samtal allt eftersom vi får in dem.
 



  





 Är du intresserad men känner att du inte uppfyller alla kriterier till 100 %? Vi uppmuntrar dig att söka ändå! Vi tror på styrkan i mångsidiga kompetenser, perspektiv och individers unika kvaliteter. Vi vill att alla ska känna sig fria att vara sig själva – dina unika förmågor kan passa perfekt för vårt team! Din perfekta match kanske är nästa tjänst vi annonserar, så varför inte ligga steget före och söka redan nu?
 



  





 Är du intresserad av att läsa mer om Orange Business? Besök vår
 
 hemsida
 
 eller följ oss på
 
 LinkedIn.

title: Data & AI Consultant
description:
Are you passionate about creating impactful data solutions that combine deep technical expertise with real business value? Are you curious about how AI can push those insights even further? Do you excel in
 **Power BI** 
 ,
 **data warehousing** 
 , and
 **data engineering** 
 , and want to stay ahead with the latest in
 **AI and analytics** 
 ?
   

  

 At Evitec Solutions, we’re growing our Stockholm team and looking for someone like you. In our team, you’ll work with top-tier clients mostly in the finance sector, helping them unlock the value of their data. Example solutions could be building robust data warehouses, designing modern BI solutions, and experimenting with AI tools.
   

  

**What you’ll be doing:**
* Designing and delivering Power BI solutions including report creation and semantic model building that drive real business decisions
* Implementing governance and administration best practices in Power BI Service
* Applying and advising on CI/CD and version control for BI (e.g., using Azure DevOps, deployment pipelines in Power BI/Fabric)
* Building modern data warehouses and data pipelines using tools like Microsoft Fabric, Snowflake, or Databricks
* Working directly with clients, advising them on architecture, governance, and AI-driven enhancements
* Working hands-on with SQL, data modeling, and cloud platforms (like Azure)
* Exploring and applying AI tools to enhance data workflows and insights


**What makes you a great fit?**
* Proven expertise in Power BI, including semantic modelling, advanced DAX, optimization, and report development
* Solid understanding of data warehousing and engineering concepts and hands-on experience with Microsoft Fabric, Snowflake, or Databricks
* Experience implementing governance and administration in Power BI Service environments
* Familiarity with CI/CD practices and deployment pipelines (e.g., Azure DevOps)
* Experience with RLS and OLS implementations
* Strong SQL skills and good understanding of data modelling principles
* At least 2 years of experience in consulting and a proactive mindset and ability to take ownership of projects and advise clients effectively
* Curiosity and enthusiasm for AI and automation in data solutions
* Fluent in Swedish in both spoken and written
* Professional level in English in both spoken and written


**Why join us?**
* Purpose with impact: Join our growing Stockholm team at Evitec and help deliver trusted insurance and risk management solutions with a strong market presence.
* Flexibility: We work in hybrid mode.
* Growth: Whether it’s certifications, mentoring, or internal training, we’re here to help you achieve your career goals.
* Compensation: We offer competitive salary and benefits.


 At Evitec Solutions, we create innovative IT solutions and advisory services that support our customers' success across industries. With over 300 professionals across the Nordics, we specialize in providing business-critical software for the finance and insurance sectors. Our solutions streamline complex processes, enabling smarter decisions and delivering long-term value.
   

  

 If you'd like to have more information about Evitec or the job before applying, you can contact People & Culture Manager Therese Blank through email: (firstname.lastname@evitec.com).
   

  

**Interested?**
 Make sure you put in your application latest 30.09.2025, we review applications on a rolling basis.

title: Spontanansökan
description:
Vi vill ständigt komma i kontakt med talangfulla specialister inom IT. Just nu har vi inga öppna tjänster att söka, men vi önskar alltid komma i kontakt med dig som är nyfiken på oss som arbetsgivare. Vi är idag ett 60-tal anställda i Sverige och Finland. I Sverige ligger vårt kontor i mysiga lokaler i Solna.
   

  

 Som anställd på Prog-IT är du med och bidrar till företagets tillväxt och framgång genom utveckling, support eller implementation av Microsofts produkter. Vi arbetar med tjänsteleverans inom IT och erbjuder våra kunder hjälp med support, hosting, drift, nätverk och säkerhet.
   

  

 På Prog-IT ges du möjlighet att arbeta i en trivsam arbetsmiljö med en teknisk utvecklingsmiljö som främjar personlig drivkraft. Du får arbeta i ett internationellt team och erbjuds attraktiva förmåner och bonussystem.
   

  

 Just nu är vi lite extra nyfikna på dig som har kompetens inom:
   

  

* Microsoft Cloud (Azure)
* Modern workplace (M365/Intune)
* Nätverksteknik (switching, routing, brandväggar och WiFi)


 Välkommen med en spontanansökan så går vi igenom din profil så snart vi har en öppning internt.

title: AI & Automation Intern (Focus: Marketing & Revenue)
description:
**Join Velory as an AI & Automation Intern with focus on Marketing & Revenue**
*Help bring AI and automation into Velory’s marketing and growth operations. You’ll work closely with the VP Revenue Operations and CEO on projects that use AI to accelerate content creation, improve campaigns, and streamline workflows in a B2B SaaS environment.*
**About The Role**
 We’re looking for a hands-on, curious, and driven AI & Automation Intern to help us bring intelligent automation into Velory’s day-to-day marketing and growth operations.
   

  

 This role is perfect for someone who wants to explore how AI agents and automation tools can accelerate content creation, streamline campaigns, and reduce operational friction across a B2B SaaS company. You’ll work directly with the VP Revenue Operations and CEO on high-leverage initiatives where AI has immediate impact, especially around marketing execution and internal workflows.
   

  

 What You’ll Do
   

  

* Prototype AI-driven workflows for content creation, sales enablement, and campaigns
* Automate first drafts of blog posts, email sequences, and sales materials
* Support campaign execution (e.g. Google, LinkedIn) using AI for copy, targeting, and analysis
* Build and document AI agent automations with tools like Clay, Zapier, or GPT-based workflows
* Help design internal systems to reduce friction and improve visibility
* Use AI to analyze customer feedback and improve marketing idea


**About You**
* Excited by AI’s potential and hands-on with tools and systems
* Strong written communicator for different formats and audiences
* Self-starter eager to test, learn, and iterate quickly
* Comfortable with prompt engineering, low-code tools, or modern SaaS—even if you’re not an engineer


**Nice to Have**
* Familiarity with ChatGPT, Clay, Zapier, HubSpot, Notion
* Experience with content marketing, SEO, or campaign execution
* Interest in B2B SaaS, RevOps, or marketing systems
* Design skills (Figma, Canva, etc.)


**Our Core Values**
 To excel in this role, you should embody Velory's core values and bring a creative, innovative spirit to our team:
   

  

* Show ownership: Look at the big picture and take the initiative to contribute where needed.
* Manage speed: Eliminate obstacles to maintain a high, sustainable pace.
* Represent quality: Aim high, sweat the details, and iterate.
* Earn trust: Be communicative, transparent, and follow through on commitments.
* Deliver wow: Go beyond expectations in a creative and unexpected way


**What We Offer**
* A unique opportunity to grow and learn in a fast-paced scale-up environment.
* Hands-on experience in a fast-paced and innovative environment.
* A collaborative and inclusive work culture.
* Flexible work arrangements.
* Located in the vibrant city of Stockholm.


**This Is Velory**
 Velory enables companies to buy and manage their IT in an automated, secure and circular way.
   

  

* IT Lifecycle Management: streamlining IT workflows from purchase to end of life.
* Employee Empowerment: unleashing productivity from the first day to the last


 Velory is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

**Join Us**
 At Velory, you’ll be more than just an intern – you'll be a key player in our mission to revolutionize the digital landscape. If you’re ready to bring your creativity, skills, and passion to our team, we’d love to hear from you!

title: DevSecOps-ingenjör (Deltid)
description:
Följ med oss på vår roliga och spännande
 **SimpleSign-resa** 
 !
   

  

 Som
 **DevSecOps-ingenjör** 
 hos oss kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att integrera säkerhet i hela vår utvecklings- och leveransprocess. Du kommer att samarbeta med vårt globala team för att säkerställa att våra tjänster är säkra, skalbara och följer branschstandarder.
   

  

**Ansvarsområden**
* Implementera säkerhetskontroller i våra CI/CD-pipelines (GitLab CI/CD, GitHub Actions).
* Genomföra säker kodgranskning (SAST/DAST) och säkerställa att bästa praxis följs.
* Övervaka och hantera säkerheten i vår GCP-infrastruktur och Kubernetes (GKE).
* Utföra regelbundna penetrationstester och sårbarhetsskanningar.
* Implementera och underhålla verktyg för loggning, övervakning och incidentrespons (t.ex. Prometheus, Grafana, ELK).
* Säkerställa att vi följer säkerhetsstandarder som ISO 27001, NIST CSF och andra relevanta ramverk.
* Utbilda och stödja utvecklingsteamet i säker kodning och säkerhetsmedvetande.
* Dokumentera säkerhetsprocesser och rekommendationer.


**Kvalifikationer**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom DevSecOps, IT-säkerhet eller relaterade områden.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med CI/CD-verktyg som GitLab CI/CD, Jenkins, GitHub Actions eller liknande.
* Stark kompetens inom molnsäkerhet, särskilt med Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
* Erfarenhet av Kubernetes (GKE) och containerorkestrering.
* Kunskap om Infrastructure as Code (IaC) med verktyg som Terraform och Ansible.
* Erfarenhet av säkerhetsverktyg som OWASP ZAP, OpenVAS, HashiCorp Vault.
* Förståelse för säkerhetsstandarder som ISO 27001, NIST CSF, CIS Benchmarks.
* Grundläggande programmeringskunskaper i Python, Bash eller liknande.
* Flytande i engelska, både i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande Kvalifikationer**
* Certifieringar såsom CKS (Certified Kubernetes Security Specialist), OSCP, CISSP, eller liknande.
* Erfarenhet av att implementera compliance-krav som SOC 2 eller GDPR.
* Erfarenhet av penetrationstestning för webbapplikationer och molninfrastruktur.


**Vad Vi Erbjuder**
* Flexibla arbetstider – anpassa jobbet till din vardag.
* Möjlighet att arbeta på distans.
* Ett engagerat team som värdesätter lärande och utveckling.
* Möjlighet att ha en stor påverkan i ett växande företag.

title: AI Sales Internship (UK and US markets)
description:
We’re looking for ambitious and relentless
 **AI Sales Interns (SDRs)** 
 to join our fast-growing team and be on the front lines of AI transformation. If you're a native speaker of
 **English** 
 —and not afraid of cold calling—this is your chance to make a real impact. You'll be working directly with our founders to identify and connect with high-potential prospects, driving new business and helping reshape how companies use AI in customer communications.
   

  

**Company Description**
 Our vision is to create the
 **world's smartest AI agent for Customer Support** 
 in the B2B SaaS sector. Our aim is to get B2B companies to
 **ticket zero by the end of 2026** 
 .
   

  

 Only a single-digit percentage of SMEs have adopted AI in their customer-facing teams. We’re already trusted by over 200 paying companies, including
 **Mynt, Yabie, Steelwrist, SVAB** 
 , and many more.
   

  

 We’re building
 **end-to-end support automation** 
 with a bold mission: to deliver
 **100% fully autonomous customer support** 
 . From triage to resolution, our AI handles the entire support flow—freeing up human teams to focus on strategy and innovation.
   

  

 Join us in building the world’s smartest and most accurate AI brain across customer domains—and beyond.
   

  

**Why You’ll Love This Role**
* Real Impact: You’re not here to watch—you’re here to close. Every meeting you book contributes directly to our growth.
* Fast-Paced Learning: Get trained by experienced sales managers, work with cutting-edge tools, and gain real-world sales experience in B2B SaaS and AI.
* Ownership: You’ll manage the full outbound process from lead sourcing to first contact and meeting booking.
* Autonomy: As a native speaker, you’ll localize and adapt our scripts and approaches to your home market.
* Performance-Driven: This is a pay-by-performance internship where effort = earnings.


**Key Responsibilities**
* Source leads and contact information—hunting creatively for phone numbers and emails without relying on automated prospecting tools.
* Own and execute the entire cold prospecting process, especially cold calling, to book qualified sales meetings.
* Tailor outreach messaging, pitch, and cold call scripts to your specific language and market.
* Record and document all sales calls, capture relevant notes, and upload recordings for internal use.
* Conduct administrative work related to your outreach—keeping everything organized and updated for handoff to sales managers.
* Maintain a high volume of outbound activity every day—this is a hustle-first, results-driven internship.
* Meet or exceed performance targets for meetings booked and qualified leads generated.


**What We’re Looking For**
* Native Speaker: You are fluent in English.
* Cold Calling Confidence: You’re not just comfortable picking up the phone—you thrive on it.
* Resourceful: You can dig deep and figure out how to find contact info even when tools aren’t provided.
* Sales Hustle: You’re motivated by targets, excited to hear “yes,” and not discouraged by “no.”
* Ambition & Drive: You want to break into the world of tech sales and are willing to work hard to make it happen.
* Attention to Detail: You stay organized and accurately document every touchpoint.


**Bonus Points For**
* Previous sales or outreach experience.
* Experience with cold calling in a B2B environment.
* Interest in AI, SaaS, or startup growth.


**Renumeration**
* 500 SEK per qualified meeting.
* 15% commission for sales closed and invoiced (commission can range from 5000 - 150,000 SEK per deal for qualified deals).


**Why Join Us?**
* Innovative Environment: Work with some of the most exciting minds in AI, in a team that values action, creativity, and results.
* Autonomy & Impact: You’ll take ownership from Day 1 and make a real impact—measurable in booked meetings and revenue influence.
* Earn What You’re Worth: Performance-based compensation means your hustle pays off—literally.

title: Technical Co-Founder
description:
**About Us:** 




 We’re building
 *ChurnVision* 
 , a predictive analytics platform that helps companies understand, anticipate, and reduce employee churn. Our mission is to give HR and business leaders the tools to make better, data-driven people decisions.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We’re looking for a passionate and entrepreneurial
 **Technical Co-Founder** 
 to join us at the ground floor. You’ll own the technical vision, architecture, and execution of the product, building a scalable, reliable, and intuitive platform. This role goes beyond coding—you’ll be shaping strategy, culture, and the future of the company alongside the founding team.
 



  





**What You’ll Do:** 




  




* Define and execute the technical roadmap for ChurnVision.
* Build and iterate on the core platform: data ingestion pipelines, prediction models, dashboards, and integrations.
* Make key decisions around technology stack, architecture, and scaling.
* Hire, mentor, and lead an engineering team as we grow.
* Collaborate with business and product co-founders to align technical execution with market needs.
* Represent technology in investor conversations and fundraising.



  





**What We’re Looking For:** 




  




* Strong software engineering background (Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, cloud architecture, data engineering/ML experience).
* Prior experience building scalable SaaS products (HR tech or predictive analytics experience is a plus).
* Familiarity with machine learning pipelines, predictive modeling, or data-driven applications.
* Comfort moving fast in a startup environment: balancing quick iteration with technical rigor.
* Strong problem-solving and product mindset—can translate business needs into smart technical solutions.
* Interest in equity ownership and long-term commitment as a true co-founder.



  





**What We Offer:** 




  





  




* **Equity** 
 and ownership in a high-potential SaaS startup.
* Free access to premium developer tools and AI coding assistants (Cursor, Claude Code, ChatGPT, GitHub Copilot, etc.) to supercharge productivity.
* Cloud credits and subscriptions to essential services (compute, hosting, design/prototyping tools).
* Freedom to shape the product, culture, and technical direction from day one.
* Close collaboration with a small, ambitious founding team.
* The thrill of solving a meaningful business problem with real impact.

title: IT Technician – Cary Group
description:
Är du en tekniskt kunnig och serviceinriktad person som brinner för att lösa IT-relaterade problem och stötta användare? Vill du vara en del av ett internationellt företag i tillväxt med en varm och entreprenöriell kultur?
   

  

 Då kan rollen som
 **IT Technician** 
 på Cary Group vara rätt för dig!
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som IT Technician kommer du att spela en viktig roll i att säkerställa att vår IT-miljö fungerar smidigt och att våra användare får snabb och professionell support. Du arbetar både självständigt och i nära samarbete med IT-avdelningen, verksamheten och externa leverantörer.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter inkluderar:
   

  

* Ge teknisk support till användare inom hårdvara, mjukvara och nätverk.
* Hantera ärenden i helpdesk och säkerställa effektiv återkoppling.
* Installera, konfigurera och uppdatera programvara enligt interna riktlinjer.
* Felsöka nätverksproblem och hjälpa användare med uppkoppling.
* Bidra till systemförvaltning och organisationens Cloud-transformation.
* Dokumentera arbetsprocesser och skapa användarguider.
* Utbilda användare i IT-system och bidra till smartare arbetssätt.


**Vad vi söker**
 Vi söker dig som har flera års erfarenhet som IT-tekniker och som trivs med att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö. Du är lösningsorienterad, noggrann och har ett genuint intresse för teknik.
   

  

**Vi ser gärna att du har:**
* Erfarenhet av Microsoft Azure och Microsoft 365.
* Intresse för teknisk support, testning och kvalitetssäkring.
* Förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i nya system och teknologier.
* God vana vid dokumentation och strukturerat arbetssätt.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och hantera flera uppgifter parallellt.
* Utmärkt kommunikationsförmåga på svenska och engelska, både muntligt och skriftligt.


**Meriterande kunskaper:**
* Erfarenhet av att leda och koordinera tekniska utredningar.
* Kunskap om webbaserade applikationer och tjänster.
* Kunskap om integrationslösningar.


**Om Cary Group**
 Cary Group är en snabbväxande internationell koncern med en unik mix av entreprenöriell anda och trygg struktur. Vi är en av marknadsledarna i Europa inom reparation och byte av fordonsglas, bussglas samt reparation av plåt- och lackskador. Vi erbjuder tjänster som förlänger fordonens livslängd och bibehåller deras säkerhetsfunktioner, med fokus på att reparera i stället för att byta ut.
   

  

 Vi värnar om vår varma och inkluderande kultur och investerar i aktiviteter och event för att stärka vårt team. Vårt kontor är beläget i Hammarby Sjöstad i Stockholm.
   

  

 För mer information besök: www.carygroup.com
   

  

**Kontakt**
 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Cary Group med Wise IT. Vill du veta mer, kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Sandra Åhs på sandra.ahs@wiseit.se.
   

  

 Vi kan tyvärr inte ta emot ansökningar via mail då vi värnar om din personliga integritet. Du kan läsa mer om hur vi behandlar personuppgifter enligt GDPR i Wise Group-koncernens policy för behandling av personuppgifter.
   

  

 Vi hanterar alla ansökningar löpande och även så urvalet av kandidater som går vidare till intervju.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Microsoft 365 & Azure Specialist – med ansvar för att bygga upp och leda vårt backoffice-team
description:
**Om oss**
 Cloudo är en innovativ leverantör av moln-, IT- och telefonitjänster inom B2B. Vi befinner oss i en expansiv fas och söker nu en erfaren och drivande Microsoft 365 & Azure Specialist som inte bara vill arbeta med teknik i framkant – utan också vara med och bygga upp och leda en ny affärsenhet inom området. Hos oss får du möjlighet att påverka, utveckla och forma framtidens digitala arbetsplatser tillsammans med engagerade kollegor och kunder som vill ligga i framkant.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 I denna nyckelroll kommer du att ansvara för att designa, implementera och optimera lösningar inom Microsoft 365 och Azure. Du kommer även att ta ett strategiskt ansvar för att bygga upp en avdelning inom området, där du leder både tekniskt arbete och teamet. Rollen innebär nära samarbete med kunder, kollegor och säljteam, samt att du fungerar som teknisk rådgivare i både interna och externa sammanhang.
   

  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**
* Designa och implementera lösningar inom Microsoft 365 (Teams, Exchange Online, SharePoint, OneDrive m.fl.)
* Leda uppbyggnaden av en ny affärsenhet med fokus på Azure och M365
* Hantera enhet- och applikationshantering via Intune
* Säkerställa informationsskydd och efterlevnad med Microsoft Purview
* Arbeta med säkerhetslösningar såsom Microsoft 365 Defender
* Implementera och administrera Windows 365-miljöer (Cloud PC)
* Automatisera och effektivisera processer med PowerShell, Power Platform och Microsoft Graph API
* Delta i migreringar, onboarding och strategisk rådgivning för kunder
* Presentera tekniska lösningar för både tekniska och icke-tekniska intressenter
* Stötta supportteamet vid behov
* Supportera säljteam under kundmöten
* Bidra till affärsutveckling och paketering av tjänster inom området


**Vi söker dig som**
* Har minst 3 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med Microsoft 365 och Azure
* Har god förståelse för Microsofts säkerhets- och efterlevnadsverktyg
* Är van att arbeta med Intune, PowerShell och samarbetsplattformar som Teams och Exchange Online
* Har erfarenhet av Windows 365 och hantering av Cloud PC-lösningar
* Har erfarenhet av att designa och implementera lösningar utifrån kundens behov
* Har ledarskapspotential eller erfarenhet av att bygga upp team eller avdelningar
* Är kommunikativ, strukturerad och har ett starkt kundfokus
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på svenska och engelska


**Meriterande**
* Certifieringar inom Microsoft 365, Azure eller relaterade områden
* Erfarenhet av migreringar från andra plattformar
* Kunskap om Azure AD och integrationer med andra molntjänster
* Certifikat (AZ-305), (AZ-400), (AZ-204) eller liknande


**Vad vi erbjuder**
* Tillsvidareanställning med fast månadslön
* Möjlighet att bygga upp och leda en ny affärsenhet
* Utvecklingsplan och kompetensutveckling – vi investerar i din framtid
* Pension och förmåner
* Möjlighet att arbeta från våra kontor i Lund eller Stockholm City
* Start: Omgående med hänsyn till uppsägningstid och genomförd säkerhetskontroll


**Ansökan**
 Vi rekryterar löpande – skicka in din ansökan redan idag och bli en del av Cloudo!

title: Solution Architect - Integration
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues both locally and around the world, reimagining what’s possible. For this role you will be part of the Cloud and Custom Application (C&CA) area at Capgemini, you will work with the latest technologies in Cloud, Integration, AI, and software development. We develop tailored applications and manage complex integrations to maximize the potential of technology. Join us and collaborate with the world's leading organizations to realize the full value of technology through innovative solutions.
   

  

**Your role**
 As an Integration Architect with Capgemini, you will be involved in leading the development and implementation of integration solutions, leveraging your expertise to drive platform transitions and support various transformation initiatives.
   

  

 In this role, you will play a key role in:
   

  

* Managing integrations and preferably transitioning to Azure Integration.
* Addressing general platform anxiety and facilitating moves between tech platforms.
* Conducting assessments and developing strategies to future-proof integration methods and establish Centers for Enablement.
* Supporting other transformations such as ERP to accelerate delivery.


**Your profile**
 Integration architect with at least 5 years of experience. Used to act forward leaning, and confident driver of change and/or excellence. Solution-oriented with a platform mindset. We prefer you to have a full professional proficiency in English and Swedish.
   

  

 Expert in some of these areas, and preferable handle several:
   

  

* Azure Integration
* iPaaS (MuleSoft, Boomi, Apigee)
* Open source integration
* Middleware (BizTalk, Tibco/IBM/etc)
* Nice to have, other hyperscale’s integration services e.g. AWS & GCP and of course an interest in generative AI


**Application**
 Excited to embark on a new career journey? We can't wait to hear from you! Apply now – we review applications continuously. Throughout the process, you'll have the opportunity to visit our office, meet with our hiring manager, and ask any questions you may have to our recruiter. We are committed to making your path to the job as seamless and fulfilling as possible. Are you the candidate we're searching for? We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

*As part of our recruitment process, where identity and background checks may be conducted, we kindly ask you to bring valid identification to this interview in order to verify your identity.*
**What We Belive You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.
* At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* Equip yourself with valuable certifications in the latest technologies
* Our Values: Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team spirit, Modesty and Fun


**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.
   

  

**Get The Future You Want** 
 | www.capgemini.com

title: Full-Stack Engineer
description:
**Join Quartr’s Data Tooling Team!**
 Quartr is a software company serving the world of finance. The Quartr ecosystem gives millions of professional investors and corporate professionals worldwide easy access to first-party information from public companies through a variety of services – including a web app, a mobile app, and an API solution.
   

  

 Our Data Tooling team is dedicated to developing and enhancing the tools crucial for our in-house data sourcing operations. We are looking for a talented individual to join this dynamic team.
   

  

**Desired qualities and skill sets:**
* You take ownership and are focused on the needs of our internal users
* Mindful of the bigger picture and the impact of technical decisions
* Eager to learn and embrace challenges
* Excellent at communicating with others
* Passionate about our mission
* At least 2 years of professional experience


**Required technical skills:**
* TypeScript
* Node.js
* React
* Docker


**Preferred technical skills:**
* Next.js
* Cloud experience (preferably AWS)
* Knowledge of other programming languages


 At Quartr, we believe in individual freedom and trust that you know what work setup suits you best. Whether you prefer to work remotely, be based at one of our offices in Stockholm or Gothenburg, or something in between, the choice is yours. However, you must be based in Sweden with a valid work permit.
   

  

**What we offer:**
* Competitive salary
* Company option plan
* Top-notch equipment of your choice
* Wellness allowance
* Occupational pension


 By joining Quartr, you'll be part of a rapid growth story in the global investor relations space, where no day is like the other – in a good way.
   

  

**Note: We aren’t looking for consultants or assistance from recruitment agencies.**
****Learn more about Quartr****
**Quartr partners with Perplexity**
**Quartr secures Investment from Altos Ventures** 
 partnering with respected San Fransisco-based VC firm to further accelerate growth and continue transforming qualitative market research
   

  

**Fourth Most Innovative Company in Personal Finance 2024** 
 as recognized by Fast Company

title: Sr. DevOps Engineer
description:
**Pax8** 
 is seeking qualified a
 **Senior DevOps Engineer** 
 , to join our team in
 **Stockholm, Sweden** 
 and embark on a thrilling journey of innovation and technological advancement.
   

  

 We encourage you to apply even
 **if you are not based close to Stockholm** 
 as the role can also be remote with occasional on-site presence.
   

  

 As a
 **Senior DevOps Engineer** 
 , you’ll play a key role in our team’s transformation. You’ll design, build, automate, test, and manage our software systems. This DevOps Engineer role is an extension of our global
 **DevOps team** 
 .
   

  

 Working closely with our tech and engineering teams, you’ll solve exciting challenges as we grow quickly.
   

  

 You’ll leverage tools like Docker containers, Kubernetes (EKS), Helm, GitHub Actions, Terraform, and other cloud-native technologies to lead our transformation from a centralized monolith to a dynamic microservices ecosystem.
   

  

 A key part of your work will be enhancing our CI/CD pipelines to accelerate value delivery while ensuring the high availability of Pax8-developed and managed services.
   

  

**About Pax8**
 Pax8 is the technology marketplace of the future, linking partners, vendors, and small to midsized businesses (SMBs) through AI-powered insights and comprehensive product support. With a global partner ecosystem of over 35,000 managed service providers, Pax8 empowers SMBs worldwide by providing software and services that unlock their growth potential and enhance their security. Committed to innovating cloud commerce at scale, Pax8 drives customer acquisition and solution consumption across its entire ecosystem.
   

  

**More About Pax8**
* For all you, tech minded people: discover our Marketplace
* Best Companies: Awarded Number 50 in the UKs Best Companies
* Our Journey from the US to EMEA: Pax8 UK HQ - Bristol Office Opening


**Get a feel for our progress, culture and how we constantly strive to be better and do better below:**
* Taste our values & culture here: Pax8 and our people
* Check our HR Leaders people ethos here: Our People and Culture Team
* See our progress in Awards: Spotlight Awards
* Scott Chasin: Exciting Times - meet our new CEO
* EU Website: Pax8 EU


 Our servant leaders put employees first and we are about delivering exceptional employee experience to inspire customer experience.
   

  

 It's an exciting time to join us as Pax8, as we have just been certified as a
 **“Great Place to Work”.**
**Your Day To Day In This Role Includes**
* Increase developer velocity and system reliability by utilizing software development expertise, collaborating with engineering teams to address reliability concerns, analyzing the sources of issues and the impact on Cloud infrastructure to help the engineering community to work in a reliable, scalable environment
* Standardize and implement baseline visibility across systems. Leverage programmatic monitoring to proactively address visibility gaps. Collaborate with teams to embed observability in the design phase, ensuring resilient and dependable systems
* Collaborate with Architecture and Platform teams to design automated solutions that eliminate repetitive tasks, enhance self-healing capabilities, improve service reliability, and enable developers to focus on delivering product features using proven, predictable frameworks
* Prioritize security by collaborating with the engineering community to implement secure solutions, address issues proactively and reactively, and use lessons learned to establish best practices that minimize disruptions to product development
* Elevate team capabilities through mentorship, project work assistance, design guidance, and participation in support and on-call rotations
* Participate in incident response and post-incident analysis to drive improvements in system reliability by contributing to rapid recovery, conducting root cause analysis, and implementing changes based on post-mortem findings.


 Join us and take the lead in driving innovation and growth in our DevOps journey!
   

  

**You'll Be Ideal For Us If You**
* Substantial years of experience supporting application development, preferably microservices and Java based web platforms.
* Substantial, proven, software development experience.
* Ability to show advanced proficiency of a relevant programming language (Java, TypeScript, Python, Groovy, Kotlin, VueJS, etc.).
* Advanced experience with one or more of the following frameworks (Spring, Spring Boot, JUnit, Mockito, Kotest, Stripe, Kafka, ElasticSearch, Netsuite, Oauth).
* Experience using AI within the SDLC to quickly deliver reliable solutions
* Strong experience with observability platforms, such as New Relic, Sumologic, Honeycomb, and similar tools to track performance and detect issues
* Solid understanding of core AWS services, including EKS, RDS, and MSK (Azure knowledge is a plus)
* Extensive experience with container technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes, with an emphasis on operational reliability
* Proven experience in debugging and troubleshooting applications, using both manual and automated methods
* Database and SQL development experience
* Understanding of IaC and configuration management using Terraform and Git
* Understanding of CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and ArgoCD
* Experience working in a Lean/Agile environment using tools such as Jira, ClickUp, Asana or similar
* Focus on meeting project commitments with predictability and urgency
* Strong presentation, written, and verbal communication skills
* Strong desire for automation
* Ability to build strong customer relationships and deliver customer-centric solutions
* Ability to take on new opportunities and tough challenges with a sense of urgency, high energy, and enthusiasm.
* Ability to gain the confidence and trust of others through honesty, integrity, and authenticity
* Ability to maneuver comfortably through complex policy, process, and people-related organizational dynamics
* Ability to anticipate and adopt innovations in business-building digital and technology applications


 In order to fulfil this role you should be resident in this country with a valid right to work.
   

  

**We encourage you to apply for a role at Pax8 even if you don’t meet 100% of the bullet points! We believe in cultivating an environment where there are a diversity of perspectives.**
 We review and acknowledge every application using real humans - please look out for a response from us to your application in your inbox but check spam too!
   

  

 We take pride in our diverse and multicultural work environment, where communication is key. Our team collectively speaks more than 23 languages, reflecting the richness of our global community. We celebrate language diversity, but we also value effective cross border collaboration business communication.
 **You should possess a strong command of business English** 
 to ensure seamless collaboration and understanding across our dynamic team.
   

  

**Salary & Benefits**
* Basic salary between 52 000 - 77 000 SEK per month - depending on experience
* Bonus: Annual performance bonus
* Long term Incentive Plan (Stock Options)
* Medical Insurance
* Life and Accident Insurance
* Long Term Disability Insurance
* Pension Coverage
* Dedicated time for training and personal development
* Unlimited access to LinkedIn Learning
* Health & Wellbeing coaching support
* Fun and frequent company and team socials


**Designated Office & Working pattern**
* Tech set up to support great Home and In-office working
* Office space in the city centre of Stockholm
* Hybrid – 1 day per week in the office
* 8:30 – 17:00 with flexibility required
* Full time: 40 hours a week


**Work Environment**
 The modern workplace is in our DNA so working from home is not a problem. However, teamwork is also valuable, so we do encourage you to regularly come together in our fantastic new offices for social events, fun and shared success!
   

  

 We offer an international and dynamic job with a high degree of responsibility and fun, in one of the coolest and fastest growing industries in the world: IT. There is plenty of room for personal growth and you will be working closely with your energetic and skilled team mates.
   

  

 If you struggle to get “time out” we’re happy to accommodate early/late conversations and interview times or if you have any queries you can ring the Talent Partner, Iulius Brezeanu, managing this role on +31880028245.
   

  

**What’s in it for you?**
 There’s plenty of scope for a talented individual to progress quickly in this opportunity or to other internal options (internal mobility in 2023 was 34%) as we grow and expand. We have our very own internal academy (the Pax8 University) for personal development plus access to Learning & Development specialist trainers and extensive "born in the cloud" mentors available for your growth. We’ll provide the opportunity stretch and projects to help you thrive and see exactly what you need to achieve to get to the next level.
   

  

**Why Pax8?**
 Our mission is to be the world’s favourite marketplace to buy cloud products. We are a fast-growing, dynamic, and high-energy organisation with a start-up feel, allowing you to make a meaningful impact on the business. Culture is important to us, and at Pax8, it’s business, and it IS personal. We are passionate, creative, and unconventional. We work hard, keep it fun, and expect the best!
   

  

 We
 **Elev8** 
 each other. We
 **Advoc8** 
 for our partners. We
 **Innov8** 
 continuously. We
 **Celebr8** 
 life.
   

  

 As part of our hiring process, we are required to undertake information verification checks on all candidates that are successful in their application with Pax8. As part of these checks Pax8 will request ID verification, reference requests and qualification checks (additional checks will be completed for UK candidates only, such as criminal and financial). All checks are completed by our third-party provider, Vero.
   

  

 Once checks have been completed all candidates will receive a copy for their records.
   

  

**Equal Opportunities**
 Pax8 are an equal opportunities employer and welcome individuals who are in possession of the appropriate requirements to work within the country the role is based in. Offered individuals will be asked to undertake identity, security compliance and reference checks. Your privacy is important to us. Your data will be held in accordance with GDPR best practices and processed only in accordance with our recruiting processes.
   

  

 Job Applicant Privacy Notice (https://www.pax8.com/en-us/terms/job-applicant-privacy-notice/)
   

  

**#IND-LP**

title: Machine Learning Engineer - Stockholm
description:
Professional Galaxy looking for a ML engineer for one of our clients in Stockholm for below job:
   

  

 Develop AI/ML software products including but not limited to explore large data set, try out new algorithms, feature engineering, test and evaluate model output, deploy the solution for production usage and scale out to the comprehensive fashion network of the company
   

  

 Design, develop & maintain the large-scale data infrastructure required for the AI/ML projects.
   

  

 Leverage on understanding of software architecture and software design patterns to write scalable, maintainable, well-designed, and future-proof code.
   

  

 Develop solutions, components, services and frameworks to address common needs in AI/ML projects, like feature reuse, model traceability, A/B test, etc.
   

  

 Required skills and experiences:
   

  

* BSc or MSc degree in computer science, engineering or related field, or equivalent practical experience.
* Have 4+ years of professional experience working in relevant role for a Machine Learning Engineer.
* You love coding, and like applying software engineering practices to machine learning projects.
* Have experience in developing software products that have been successfully deployed to production.
* Have several years of coding experience in modern programming languages, and strong background in Python programming, i.e. 3+ years.
* Have great experience with cloud technologies for ML development, preferably Google Cloud and also Vertex AI.
* Have solid experience in MLOps practices, developing ML pipelines, and deploying ML applications to production.
* Have a strong working knowledge of a variety of AI/ML techniques and experience working with different frameworks.
* Have experience handling high volume heterogeneous data (both batch and stream) and a solid understanding of data structures, databases, and data storage technologies.
* Familiar with agile ways of working, team collaboration, data-driven development, reliable and responsible experimentation.


 Deadline to submit: 20250505
   

  

 Duration: 20250512 - 20251231
   

  

 We recommend you to submit the application asap because position can be filled before the deadline.

title: Data Scientist
description:
We are super excited to announce that our Engineering Manager Robin Bodin is looking to welcome a next colleague to Voyados Intelligence team.
   

  

 As part of this team, you’ll play a key role in transforming how we deliver insights to our customers through beautiful, scalable, and user friendly dashboards and reports. You’ll help us rethink our reporting system using a new third-party BI tool, with the freedom to influence everything from KPI standardization to data visualization best practices.
   

  

**Some of the things you'll be up to:**
* Design and build interactive dashboards and embedded reports that deliver meaningful insights to our retail customers.
* Collaborate closely with Product Managers, UX, Data Platform, and CSM to ensure we meet real user needs.
* Explore and structure data using SQL to create new KPIs and calculated metrics.
* Set the foundation for how we work with reporting and data visualizations.


 This is a unique opportunity to join at the beginning of an exciting journey. With embedded analytics being a new area for us, you’ll have a direct hand in shaping how it evolves. Reporting is a key part of our product offering, so your work will make a visible impact, both internally and for thousands of end users. Most importantly, you’ll be part of transforming reporting from a supporting tool into a core element of the Voyado customer experience.
   

  

 So, who are you?
   

  

 We’re looking for someone with hands on experience in modern BI tools such as Sigma, Looker, Tableau, Power BI, or Qlik. You have strong SQL skills and are comfortable working with structured data. What sets you apart is your keen eye for user experience in data visualization, you understand how users interpret data and design accordingly. You’re experienced in turning raw data into customer facing insights that add real business value. If you also have knowledge of embedded BI solutions, SaaS platforms, or the retail and e-commerce space, that’s a great bonus.
   

  

 What's in it for you?
   

  

 Voyado wouldn’t be the powerful platform it is without the people behind it. We really care for our Voyadoers and some examples of what we can offer you are:
   

  

* An engaged team with a knowledge-sharing and friendly culture
* Summits where we hang out, workshop, discuss, and have a good time together
* Opportunities for personal and professional growth and learning in a dynamic and supportive environment.
* Work life balance – we don't have a long work-hours culture, we value engagement over hours worked.
* An office-first but flexible hybrid working policy.


 Some of our benefits:
   

  

* 30 days of vacation, so you can spend time on the things you love
* Beneficial bike lease, including e-bikes
* Breakfast buffet on Fridays
* Inhouse gym only for Voyadoers
* A generous gadget-and-phone package (your choice!)
* 5000 SEK per year in wellness allowance
* A wellness hour you can use every week


**About Voyado**
 Voyado is the ultimate solution for personalization and relevance across all channels—online and offline. Used by retailers and e-commerce companies worldwide, Voyado makes it possible for every brand to engage customers, elevate shopping experiences, and evolve their own businesses.
   

  

 We are now a company of 300+ colleagues on an exciting journey and have recently established a presence in new markets to strengthen our position in Europe. If you are ready for your next adventure and want to join our team on our expansion throughout Europe and have an interest in customer care, e-commerce, retail, and tech - let's get in touch!
   

  

****Be yourself 🏳️‍🌈****
 At Voyado, we believe in gender equality. We are proud sponsors of Womengineer as well as Tjejer Kodar! Read more about Tjejer Kodar & Voyado here
   

  

  

  

 Equality is not only about gender but also about making everyone feel welcome and heard in a multicultural and diverse environment. We at Voyado strive to make everyone feel like they can bring their true self to work every day. Gender-equal and diverse teams have more perspectives on life and bring different ideas to the table which in the end leads not only to making a better working environment but also a better product.
   

  

 Ready to find out more?
   

  

 Lovely! 🎉
   

  

 Applications are reviewed on-going, but the final deadline to apply is October 23rd.
   

  

*Before one applies it can always feel like you need a better resume, more polish, or just another year of experience, but we say if you think this sounds like a place where you can shine don't hesitate to send in your resume!*
 We'd love to get to know you and understand what makes you tick, so write a few lines about what you enjoy about your current role and what would be an exciting challenge for you in the future. We are eager to get to know you and what you love to do, so be yourself and let your passion shine through in your application!
   

  

*Note: As of right now, we are unable to proceed with applicants outside of the EU, and a requirement of eligibility to work at Voyado is the right to work in the EU without limitations. Needless to say, this is something we are actively working on to be able to onboard colleagues from all over the world.*
 Voyado is the customer experience platform made for retail. We help brands turn every interaction—from first click to repeat purchase—into lasting loyalty.
   

  

 With AI-powered tools for search, personalization, marketing, and loyalty, we make it easy for retailers to grow and connect with customers in smarter ways.
   

  

 Loved by 400+ brands, Voyado is on a mission to become Europe’s most beloved retail companion.
